T02D2511:1b-1: shr'i pa ra m'a dya bi ba ra nam /
T02D2511:1b-4: bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2511:1b-5: rdo rje 'dzin pa chen [dd] po'i sa //
T02D2511:1b-6: thog ma tha ma med dge ba //
T02D2511:1b-7: dpal mchog dang po'i rgyud las gsungs //
T02D2511:1b-8: chos kyi sku la sogs bsdus pa //
T02D2511:1b-9: rdo rje 'dzin chen dad pa yi //
T02D2511:1b-10: yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal te //
T02D2511:1b-11: 'gro bas de ni gnas thob phyir //
T02D2511:1b-12: rab tu phye ste bshad par bya //
T02D2511:1b-13: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes bya ba la
T02D2511:1b-14: sogs pa tshig nye bar dgod pa 'di'i brjod par
T02D2511:1b-15: bya ba ni gang zhig yin /
T02D2511:1b-17: dgos pa ni ci zhig yod ;
T02D2511:1b-18: dgos pa'i dgos pa ni ci zhig yin zhe na /
T02D2511:1b-19: rgyud 'di'i ming dpal mchog dang po zhes bya ba
T02D2511:1b-20: la dpal mchog dang po ni chos kyi sku la
T02D2511:1b-21: sogs pa'i mtshan nyid de nam mkha'i khams thams cad
T02D2511:1b-22: ltar rtag tu bzhugs pa sku dang gsung dang thugs
T02D2511:1b-23: rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs
T02D2511:1b-24: la bzhugs pa / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ni rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po ste /
T02D2511:2a-2: de ston par byed pa'i sgra'i tshogs ni rgyud yin no //
T02D2511:2a-3: rgyud kyi brjod par bya ba dang /
T02D2511:2a-4: de ston par byed pa'i mtshan nyid ni 'brel ba yin no //
T02D2511:2a-5: de lta bu'i bcom ldan 'das gdul bya rnams 'dod pa bskyed pa ni dgos pa yin no //
T02D2511:2a-7: dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa la sogs pa 'jig rten
T02D2511:2a-8: dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'bras bu thob par
T02D2511:2a-9: 'gyur ba ni / dgos pa'i yang dgos par bshad pa yin no //
T02D2511:2a-10: de la bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags kyis 'dod chags spang bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2511:2a-11: dam tshig ni sems dpa' chen por byin gyis brlabs
T02D2511:2a-12: pa rdo rje dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gsang sngags
T02D2511:2a-13: la sogs pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs pa yin no //
T02D2511:2a-14: rang bzhin bzang ba'i sems can rnams 'dul bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2511:2a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D2511:2a-16: gsang sngags kyi tshul gyis bzhugs pa yin no //
T02D2511:2a-17: khro bas khro ba spang bar bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2511:2a-18: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i tshul gyis so //
T02D2511:2a-19: log par lta ba spang bar bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2511:2a-20: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor dang sngags kyi tshul gyis so //
T02D2511:2a-21: ser sna rab tu spang bar bya ba'i phyir dang /
T02D2511:2a-22: bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2511:2b-0: 'phags @2b pa nam mkha'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor dang sngags kyi tshul gyis so //
T02D2511:2b-1: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi mtshan nyid gcig tu bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2511:2b-2: 'phags pa rdo rje khu tshur gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sngags la sogs pa'i tshul gyis so //
T02D2511:2b-3: chos bdag med pa dang ma bral na /
T02D2511:2b-4: thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir dang /
T02D2511:2b-5: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan
T02D2511:2b-6: na thams cad 'byor par 'gyur ro zhes bstan par
T02D2511:2b-7: bya ba'i phyir 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2511:2b-8: dang / sngags la sogs pa'i sngags dang tshul gyis so //
T02D2511:2b-9: dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa med par gsang sngags kyi
T02D2511:2b-10: tshul 'grub par mi 'gyur ro zhes bstan par bya
T02D2511:2b-11: ba'i phyir / 'phags pa rdo rje 'khor lo'i dkyil
T02D2511:2b-12: 'khor dang gsang sngags la sogs pa'i tshul gyis so
T02D2511:2b-13: ba'i phyir / // mchod pas 'grub par 'gyur gyi /
T02D2511:2b-14: tshogs med par ma yin no zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2511:2b-15: 'phags pa nam mkha'i mdzod kyi dkyil 'khor dang gsang sngags kyi tshul gyis so //
T02D2511:2b-16: nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi gnyen por gyur pa'i
T02D2511:2b-17: dge ba'i phyogs rnams la phyi rol gyi lha'i bu'i
T02D2511:2b-18: bdud la sogs pa'i bdud rnams tshar gcod par nus
T02D2511:2b-19: na 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bstan par bya ba'i
T02D2511:2b-20: phyir / 'phags pa rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi dkyil
T02D2511:2b-21: 'khor dang sngags la sogs pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs pa
T02D2511:2b-22: phyir / yin no // dkyil 'khor gcig tu zhugs
T02D2511:2b-23: pas dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur bar
T02D2511:2b-25: thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid bdag yin no zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2511:2b-26: bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bzhugs pa yin no //
T02D2511:2b-27: zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor dang ma mo dang po gsum
T02D2511:2b-28: dang srid mo bzhi'i dkyil 'khor ni de la mos
T02D2511:2b-29: pa'i sems can rnams dga' bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2511:2b-30: de ltar sprul par mdzad nas don gyi sgo nas bstan pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2511:2b-31: de la rdo rje sems dpa' ni ngo bo nyid
T02D2511:2b-32: kyi sku yin la de nyid ni chos kyi sku
T02D2511:2b-33: ste / gnyis su med pa'i thugs me long lta bu'i ye shes te /
T02D2511:2b-34: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang dpe byad dang ldan pa /
T02D2511:2b-35: sku thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyang chos kyi
T02D2511:2b-36: dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo nyid yin no
T02D2511:2b-39: rdo rje gnod sbyin ni sprul pa'i sku ste /
T02D2511:3a-0: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid yin @3a * //
T02D2511:3a-2: /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /
T02D2511:3a-3: sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ste /
T02D2511:3a-4: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid yin no //
T02D2511:3a-5: 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po dang /
T02D2511:3a-6: nam mkha'i mdzod ni rnam par smin pa'i sku ste /
T02D2511:3a-7: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid yin no //
T02D2511:3a-8: 'phags pa 'jam dpal yang shes rab kyi pha rol
T02D2511:3a-9: tu phyin pa dang gnyis su med par bzhugs pa'i
T02D2511:3a-10: ngo bo nyid kyis na 'dir gnyis su med pa'i
T02D2511:3a-11: thugs kyi mtshan nyid yin pas /
T02D2511:3a-12: ngo bo nyid kyi sku'i khongs su gtogs so //
T02D2511:3a-13: 'jig rten pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams kyang sprul pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas /
T02D2511:3a-14: bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid yin no //
T02D2511:3a-16: rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur bas //
T02D2511:3a-17: ngo bo nyid kyi sku ru 'dod //
T02D2511:3a-18: rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur bas //
T02D2511:3a-19: mtshan dang de bzhin dpe byad do //
T02D2511:3a-20: rdo rje chos kyi dbang bskur bas //
T02D2511:3a-21: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yang yin //
T02D2511:3a-22: rdo rje las kyi dbang bskur bas //
T02D2511:3a-23: de bzhin sprul pa'i sku yin no //
T02D2511:3a-26: sangs rgyas thams cad gcig tu bsdus pa yin no //
T02D2511:3a-27: ji ltar na me long lta bu'i ye shes la
T02D2511:3a-28: sogs pa dang dkyil 'khor dang gsang sngags la sogs
T02D2511:3a-29: pa'i dkyil 'khor ngo bo nyid du rnam par gzhag
T02D2511:3a-30: ce na / rgyu dang 'bras bu'i nye bar gdags pa'i tshul gyis de'i rgyu mthun pa la /
T02D2511:3a-31: de skad nye bar bstan te /
T02D2511:3a-33: stong pa nyid ni gzugs so zhes gsungs pas na /
T02D2511:3a-35: dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ngo bo nyid kyis ngo bo nyid du dum bu gnyis pa ni /
T02D2511:3a-36: bde ba chen po'i rdo rje mchog gi dam tshig
T02D2511:3a-37: dam pa'i dkyil 'khor yi ge bcu bdun pa'i sngags
T02D2511:3a-38: la sogs pa'i tshul yin la /
T02D2511:3a-39: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
T02D2511:3a-40: rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje dang /
T02D2511:3a-49: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul de nyid yin te /
T02D2511:3a-50: yang 'di rnams nyid kyi rtog pa las las kyi
T02D2511:3a-51: sgrib pa'i dbang gis dum bu dang po las gsungs
T02D2511:3a-52: pa ma grub pa rnams myur du grub par bya
T02D2511:3a-53: ba'i phyir ro // bde ba chen po rdo rje chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D2511:3b-1: rdo rje me ltar rab tu 'bar ba dang /
T02D2511:3b-2: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /
T02D2511:3b-6: klu dang sdug bsngal 'don pa dang /
T02D2511:3b-8: gsang sngags la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid de /
T02D2511:3b-9: de nyid ni ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i dkyil
T02D2511:3b-10: 'khor du zhugs pa rnams kyang myur du 'grub par
T02D2511:3b-11: 'gyur ba dang / dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang
T02D2511:3b-12: ba lnga'i de kho na nyid chen po dam tshig
T02D2511:3b-13: 'gyur ba dang / gsum dang / rdo rje me ltar rab tu 'bar ba dang /
T02D2511:3b-14: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /
T02D2511:3b-17: dkyil 'khor dang sngags pa la sogs pa'i tshul yin no //
T02D2511:3b-18: chos kyi phyag rgya'i don gyi ngo bo nyid dang /
T02D2511:3b-19: dngos grub rnams kyang myur du bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2511:3b-20: bsgrub pa'i khyad par bsdus pa'i ngo bo nyid du
T02D2511:3b-21: ma bu gsum par yang bde ba chen po rdo
T02D2511:3b-22: rje chen po'i dkyil 'khor chen po de bzhin gshegs
T02D2511:3b-24: rdo rje me ltar rab tu 'bar ba dang /
T02D2511:3b-25: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /
T02D2511:3b-29: klu dang sdug bsngal gdon pa dang /
T02D2511:3b-30: bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor dang sngags la sogs pa'i tshul yin no //
T02D2511:3b-32: gsang ba lnga pa'i ras ris kyi dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D2511:3b-33: lnga po bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi ngo bo nyid dang /
T02D2511:3b-34: sgrub pa po myur du 'grub par bya ba'i phyir des bzhugs pa yin no //
T02D2511:3b-35: las kyi phyag rgya'i don gyi ngo bo nyid dang /
T02D2511:3b-36: dngos grub rnams kyang myur du bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir dang /
T02D2511:3b-37: bsgrub pa'i khyad par bsdus pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis
T02D2511:3b-38: dum bu bzhi par yang bde ba chen po rdo
T02D2511:3b-39: rje chen po'i dkyil 'khor chen po dang /
T02D2511:3b-41: rdo rje me ltar rab tu 'bar ba dang /
T02D2511:3b-42: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /
T02D2511:3b-49: sngags la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyang /
T02D2511:3b-51: dkyil 'khor lnga pa myur du 'grub pa'i phyir /
T02D2511:3b-52: bsgrub pa'i khyad par nyid kyis bzhugs pa yin no //
T02D2511:3b-53: ngo bo nyid dang rnam par smin pa dang /
T02D2511:4a-0: sprul pa'i skur rnam par gzhag pa @4a * //
T02D2511:4a-2: thams cad du snga ma kho na bzhin du blta bar bya'o //
T02D2511:4a-3: ngan song gsum dang mi dang /
T02D2511:4a-4: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha dang /
T02D2511:4a-5: gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams rnam par sbyang bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2511:4a-6: dum bu bzhi pa las bshad pa'i bsgom pa 'gro
T02D2511:4a-7: ba thams cad khyab par byed pa sngags pa rnams
T02D2511:4a-8: kyis bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2511:4a-9: dum bu bzhi bstan pa yin no zhes gzhan dag 'chad do //
T02D2511:4a-10: tshul 'di ni rigs pa'i tshul yin te /
T02D2511:4a-11: rgya che ba la sred pa rnams ni spros pa'i
T02D2511:4a-12: ye shes nas brtsams pa ni dum bu dang po'o
T02D2511:4a-13: // bsgrub pa'i khyad par cung zad cig bstan pa'i sgo nas yang dag par ston pa ni /
T02D2511:4a-15: / don gsal bar bya ba ni dum bu gsum par ston to //
T02D2511:4a-16: dum bu gsum pa'i 'dod pa'i don ni dum bu bzhi par ston te /
T02D2511:4a-17: yang dang yang du dum bu gzhan gyis de'i don yang dag par mtshon pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2511:4a-18: 'di nyid du bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis /
T02D2511:4a-19: don 'di nyid yongs su gzung bar mdzad nas /
T02D2511:4a-20: slar yang 'dir ston par mdzad cing /
T02D2511:4a-21: snying po gsungs par gyur pa ni /
T02D2511:4a-22: yang dang yang du bstan pas the tshom dang bral ba la rab tu 'jug cing /
T02D2511:4a-23: ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa 'grub par 'gyur ba yin no //
T02D2511:4a-25: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dag / yang dang yang du legs gsungs pa //
T02D2511:4a-26: gsang sngags de la dam pa mchog / zlos pa po ni 'grub par 'gyur //
T02D2511:4a-28: 'jig rten pa'i bstan bcos la yang tshul 'di snang
T02D2511:4a-29: ste cho ga de nyid kyis rang gi blo'i mtshan
T02D2511:4a-30: nyid gang la spros par byas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2511:4a-31: de pas na 'dir zlos pa po'i nyes pa'i rtog pa mi bya'o //
T02D2511:4a-32: de la 'dir bsgrub pa'i khyad par cung zad cig yod pa 'di lta ste /
T02D2511:4a-34: phyag rgya'i khyad par ni dum bu gsum par /
T02D2511:4a-35: lha mo bzhi dang yang dag par 'dus pa la sogs pa gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor lnga pa dang /
T02D2511:4a-36: gnyis pa he ma h'a su kha zhes bya ba la sogs pa spyan 'dren pa'i sngags dang /
T02D2511:4a-37: gsum pa dang bzhi par h'um ma h'a su kha zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang /
T02D2511:4a-38: gnyis par aom zhes bya ba la sogs pa bum pa'i sngags dang /
T02D2511:4a-40: bzhi par yi ge h'um zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang /
T02D2511:4a-41: de bzhin du aom ma dhu badzri zhes bya ba
T02D2511:4a-42: la sogs pa mchod pa'i lha mo rnams kyi sngags
T02D2511:4b-0: dang / yang gsang ba lnga'i dkyil 'khor gyi @4b de kho na nyid kyis spyan drang ba'o //
T02D2511:4b-1: de bzhin du gzhan ngag kyang rgyud kyi nang du blta bar bya'o //
T02D2511:4b-2: de ltar na dum bu dang bor ni dkyil 'khor bco lnga pa'o //
T02D2511:4b-3: gnyis par ni rdo rje gsang ba'i cho ga dang bcas pa nyi shu rtsa bdun no //
T02D2511:4b-4: gsum par ni nyi shu rtsa gcig go / bzhi par ni dkyil 'khor bco lnga ste /
T02D2511:4b-5: spyir bsdu na dkyil 'khor bdun cu rtsa brgyad du 'gyur ro //
T02D2511:4b-6: de nas 'di rnams kyi gzhi dang dbyibs kyi khyad
T02D2511:4b-7: par mdor bsdus nas ji lta ba bzhin du bshad
T02D2511:4b-8: par bya ste / de la dam tshig chen po'i
T02D2511:4b-9: de kho na nyid byin gyis brlabs pa rdo rje'i
T02D2511:4b-10: dkyil 'khor chen po ni zur bzhi pa la sogs
T02D2511:4b-12: de'i nang du phyi'i dkyil 'khor bzhi'i zur pa la
T02D2511:4b-13: sgo bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor de'i phyed kyi tshad la
T02D2511:4b-14: ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa
T02D2511:4b-15: / phyi rol nas rdo rje phreng ba zlum pos nye bar yongs su bskor bar gnas la /
T02D2511:4b-16: lha thams cad kyi gnas su sdong bu dang bcas pa'i sna tshogs padma'i gdan byas la ;
T02D2511:4b-17: de'i dbus su rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02D2511:4b-18: mdun du rdo rje yid las byung pa /
T02D2511:4b-19: g-yas su rdo rje ki li ki la /
T02D2511:4b-20: rgyab tu rdo rje dran pa /
T02D2511:4b-21: g-yon du rdo rje snyems pa'o //
T02D2511:4b-22: me'i phyogs kyi cha la rdo rje sbrang rtsi /
T02D2511:4b-23: bden bral gyi phyogs su rdo rje sprin /
T02D2511:4b-24: rlung gi phyogs su rdo rje ston /
T02D2511:4b-25: dbang ldan gyi phyogs kyi re'u cha la rdo rje dgun no ;
T02D2511:4b-26: / dkyil 'khor 'di'i rgyab rdo rje srad bu'i nang
T02D2511:4b-27: gi shar phyogs su mi bskyod pa g-yas dang g-yon
T02D2511:4b-28: logs na phyag na rdo rje dang /
T02D2511:4b-30: lho phyogs su rin chen 'byung ldan nam mkha'i snying po dang /
T02D2511:4b-31: nam mkha'i mdzod kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba'o //
T02D2511:4b-32: nub kyi phyogs su 'od dpag med pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /
T02D2511:4b-33: sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas 'khor du byas pa'o //
T02D2511:4b-34: byang gi phyogs su don yod grub pa rdo rje khu tshur dang /
T02D2511:4b-35: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis 'khor du bskor ba'o //
T02D2511:4b-36: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams rnams su sgeg mo dang bzhad pa mo dang /
T02D2511:4b-37: glu mkhan ma dang gar mkhan ma'o //
T02D2511:4b-38: shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su ni gzugs dang
T02D2511:4b-39: sgra dang dri dang ro gzugs la sogs pa'i phyag
T02D2511:4b-41: shar phyogs kyi phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi snam bu la 'jig rten pa'i lha phyed langs pa /
T02D2511:5a-1: ka rti ka / dbang po drag po chung ma dang bcas pa'o //
T02D2511:5a-5: mig dmar chung ma dang bcas pa'o //
T02D2511:5a-6: nub kyi phyogs su gtum bag can dang /
T02D2511:5a-9: lus ngan po chung ma dang bcas pa'o //
T02D2511:5a-10: byang gi phyogs su phag dang /
T02D2511:5a-14: chung ma dang bcas par gnas pa'o //
T02D2511:5a-15: sgo rnams su ni stobs bzang dang /
T02D2511:5a-17: rgyal ba dang rgyal ba thob pa chung ma dang bcas pa'o //
T02D2511:5a-18: phyi'i dkyil 'khor du rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2511:5a-19: dang 'dra ba las de'i nang du bzhi cha ba'i
T02D2511:5a-20: tshad la ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes par
T02D2511:5a-21: byas pa / zlum po dkyil 'khor de'i nyis 'gyur ni gnyis pa'o //
T02D2511:5a-22: de'i phyi rol du de'i sum 'gyur ni gsum pa ste /
T02D2511:5a-24: lha thams cad kyi gnas su sna tshogs pa'i padma'i stan rnam par bzhag pa la /
T02D2511:5a-25: dbus su bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad sprul
T02D2511:5a-26: pa'i sku ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa
T02D2511:5a-27: / sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs brgyad kyis yongs su
T02D2511:5a-28: bskor ba'o // gnyis pa dkyil 'khor zlum po'i nang du shar phyogs nas brtsams te /
T02D2511:5a-29: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa ste byang chub sems dpa' gnyis kyi dbus su bzhugs par bya'o //
T02D2511:5a-30: gsum pa'i zlum po'i nang du shar gyi phyogs su phyag na rdo rje /
T02D2511:5a-31: de bzhin du me la sogs pa'i phyogs mtshams rnams su 'jam dpal dang /
T02D2511:5a-34: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /
T02D2511:5a-35: sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /
T02D2511:5a-37: rdo rje gnod sbyin der bzhugs par bya'o //
T02D2511:5a-38: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams su sgeg mo dang /
T02D2511:5a-42: sgo rnams su ni bum pa bzhi bya'o //
T02D2511:5a-43: yang shar phyogs kyi sgor 'dur bas dang bcas pa'o //
T02D2511:5a-47: gos kyis brgyan pa'i snod ro drug gis yongs su gang ba'o //
T02D2511:5a-48: nub tu ni stan shin tu 'jam po'o //
T02D2511:5a-49: byang du ni sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs rnam par gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2511:5a-50: phyi'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor dang
T02D2511:5a-51: 'dra ba las de'i nang du de'i phyed kyi tshad
T02D2511:5a-52: zlum po rdo rje thig gis bskor ba /
T02D2511:5b-0: dkyil @5b 'khor brgyad pa lta bur 'bar ba'i phreng ba yongs su 'khrug pas khyab pa'o //
T02D2511:5b-1: de ltar lha thams cad kyi gnas su sna tshogs
T02D2511:5b-2: padma'i gdan la dbus su rdo rje h'um mdzad de'i
T02D2511:5b-3: spyan sngar g-yas brkyang pas bzhugs te /
T02D2511:5b-4: g-yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje bsnams pa /
T02D2511:5b-5: g-yon pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur gyis sdigs mdzub mdzad par brtson pa'o //
T02D2511:5b-6: g-yas su ni lcags kyu bsnams pa'o //
T02D2511:5b-7: rgyab tu ral gri bsnams pa'o //
T02D2511:5b-8: g-yon du ni zhags pa bsnams pa'o //
T02D2511:5b-9: me la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su ni dbyig pa dang /
T02D2511:5b-12: chu gra bsnams pa'i khro bo rnams so //
T02D2511:5b-13: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams rnams su ni sgeg mo la sogs pa'o //
T02D2511:5b-14: nang gi snam bu de nyid la lha la sogs
T02D2511:5b-15: pa las dbang phyug chen po chung ma dang bcas
T02D2511:5b-16: pa ston la rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D2511:5b-17: tshul gyis rang rang gi phyogs su gnas par bya'o
T02D2511:5b-18: // shar gyi sgor ni mda' dang gzhu'o //
T02D2511:5b-21: byang du ni mdung bsgreng nas gnas par bya'o //
T02D2511:5b-22: phyi'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor dang
T02D2511:5b-23: 'dra ba las de'i phyad kyi tshad la mtshams sgo
T02D2511:5b-24: la mngon par phyogs pa gnyis te /
T02D2511:5b-25: ka ba brgyad kyi tshul dang padma 'dab ma brgyad
T02D2511:5b-26: pas brgyan pa la lha thams cad kyi gnas su
T02D2511:5b-27: sna tshogs padma'i gdan la de'i dbus su bcom ldan
T02D2511:5b-28: 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug go //
T02D2511:5b-29: de'i spyan snga nas brtsams te /
T02D2511:5b-34: mi mdzad kyi bdag po rnams so //
T02D2511:5b-35: me la sogs pa'i 'dab ma rnams la padma chen mo sa 'dzin dang /
T02D2511:5b-36: rgya mtsho dang nyi ma dang /
T02D2511:5b-37: rlung rnams g-yas nas bskor ba'i tshul du gzhag go
T02D2511:5b-38: / phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams rnams su dpal chen
T02D2511:5b-41: dkyil 'khor la gnas pa rnams te /
T02D2511:5b-47: shar phyogs kyi sgor ni bud med kyi gzugs can no //
T02D2511:5b-49: nub tu ni phag go / byang du ni padma'i gzugs can yang dag par dgod par bya'o //
T02D2511:5b-50: phyi'i dkyil 'khor ni snga ma dang 'dra'o //
T02D2511:5b-51: de'i phyed kyi nang du nor bu rin po che
T02D2511:6a-0: zur brgyad pa rin po che'i ka ba brgyad @6a
T02D2511:6a-2: rin po che'i lcug mas yongs su bskor ba /
T02D2511:6a-3: rdo rje rin po che'i re bas bskor ba /
T02D2511:6a-6: rda yab kyis nye bar bsgrub par byas pas mdzes par gnas par bya'o //
T02D2511:6a-7: de'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po
T02D2511:6a-8: rta dang ldan pa'i shing rta la chibs pas bzhugs
T02D2511:6a-9: pa'o // de'i mdun du sna tshogs padmas dbang bskur
T02D2511:6a-10: ba'i rin chen rdo rje rin po che'i cod pan
T02D2511:6a-11: pa'o // thogs pa'o // g-yas su rin chen nor sbyin gter gyi bum pa phyag na bsnams pa'o //
T02D2511:6a-12: rgyab tu chos kyi rin chen phyag na glegs bam bsnams pa'o ;
T02D2511:6a-13: / g-yon du ro'i snod phyag na bsnams pa'o //
T02D2511:6a-14: me la sogs pa'i mtshams su ni rin po che'i gdugs dang /
T02D2511:6a-17: rin po che'i srog shing phyag na bsnams pa'i lha mo rnams bya'o //
T02D2511:6a-18: phyi rol gyi mtshams rnams su ni bum pa gang ba gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2511:6a-19: shar phyogs kyi sgor ni rin po che'i cod pan no //
T02D2511:6a-20: lhor ni gter gyi bum pa'o //
T02D2511:6a-21: nub tu ni rgyal mtshan no //
T02D2511:6a-22: byang du ni ro'i snod do //
T02D2511:6a-23: phyi rol du ni rgyal mtshan dang ba dan la sogs pa gnas par bya'o //
T02D2511:6a-24: phyi'i dkyil 'khor ni snga ma dang 'dra'o //
T02D2511:6a-25: de'i phyed kyis de'i nang du rdo rje thig zlum
T02D2511:6a-26: pos bskor ba ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes
T02D2511:6a-27: par byas pa / lha thams cad kyi gnas su sna tshogs padma'i gdan byas te /
T02D2511:6a-28: de'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur ro //
T02D2511:6a-29: de'i mdun du ni rdo rje sku mchog go //
T02D2511:6a-30: g-yas su ni rdo rje lcags so //
T02D2511:6a-31: rgyab tu ni ting nge 'dzin rdo rje'o //
T02D2511:6a-32: g-yon du ni rdo rje'i rdo rje'o //
T02D2511:6a-33: me la sogs pa'i mtshams su ni phyag rgya'i don dang /
T02D2511:6a-35: khu tshur bzang mo zhes bya ba'i mchod pa'i lha mo rnams so //
T02D2511:6a-36: phyi'i mtshams rnams su ni sgeg mo la sogs pa'o //
T02D2511:6a-37: shar phyogs kyi sgor ni rdo rje snyems ma'o //
T02D2511:6a-38: lhor ni rdo rje lcags ma'o //
T02D2511:6a-39: nub tu ni ting nge 'dzin rdo rje ma'o //
T02D2511:6a-40: byang du ni rdo rje rdo rje ma'i zhes bya ba'i lha mo rnams yang dag par gnas so //
T02D2511:6a-41: phyi'i dkyil 'khor ni snga ma dang 'dra'o //
T02D2511:6a-42: de'i nang du ni de'i phyed kyi 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa /
T02D2511:6a-43: dkyil 'khor brgyad pa 'dra ba'i tshul la /
T02D2511:6a-44: 'khor lo'i steng du shar phyogs nas brtsams te /
T02D2511:6b-0: bskor ba'i phyogs su aa @6b la sogs pa'i yi
T02D2511:6b-1: ge'i phreng bzhir mthar thug pa'i bar du bri bar
T02D2511:6b-2: bya'o // de ni 'dir aar ba tsan zhes bya ste /
T02D2511:6b-3: 'dod pa thams cad thob par byed pa'o //
T02D2511:6b-5: yi ge aa ni 'dod pa zhes bshad do //
T02D2511:6b-6: yi ge ra ni chags pa zhes bshad do //
T02D2511:6b-7: yi ge pa ni don dam pa zhes bshad do //
T02D2511:6b-8: yi ge tsa ni spyod pa zhes bshad do //
T02D2511:6b-9: na zhes bya ba ni dngos po med pa zhes bshad de //
T02D2511:6b-14: dngos po med pa nyid do //
T02D2511:6b-15: de ltar 'di bsgoms nas snying po bsgrub pas 'dod pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D2511:6b-16: 'dod pa thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed pa ste /
T02D2511:6b-17: des na snying po 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
T02D2511:6b-18: dang rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid myur du thob par
T02D2511:6b-19: 'gyur ro // de la lha thams cad kyi gnas
T02D2511:6b-20: su ni sna tshogs padma yang dag par gnas pa
T02D2511:6b-21: la 'khor lo'i lte bar bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal
T02D2511:6b-22: 'gyur ro // lo // de'i ngos rnams su de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i gzugs brgyad bya'o //
T02D2511:6b-23: phyi rol gyi mtshams rnams su shes rab kyi pha
T02D2511:6b-24: rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam bzhi gzhag par bya'o
T02D2511:6b-25: // shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su ni ral gri dang /
T02D2511:6b-28: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2511:6b-29: phyi'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2511:6b-30: gyi tshul ji lta ba dang 'dra bde'i nang du
T02D2511:6b-31: de'i phyed kyis rdo rje'i thig ka ba brgyad kyis
T02D2511:6b-33: thams cad kyi gnas su ni sna tshogs padma'i gdan bya'o //
T02D2511:6b-34: de'i dbus su sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'o //
T02D2511:6b-35: phyogs dang mtshams rnams su ni phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa'o //
T02D2511:6b-36: phyi'i mtshams kyi nang gi me la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su g-yas nas bskor te /
T02D2511:6b-37: zhi ba mdung gis mtshan pa dang /
T02D2511:6b-40: srid mo bzhi'i dkyil 'khor gnas par bya'o //
T02D2511:6b-41: shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su ni rdo rje sems dpa' dang /
T02D2511:6b-42: rdo rje h'um mdzad dang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /
T02D2511:6b-43: nam mkha'i snying po yang dag par gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2511:6b-44: nam mkha'i mdzod kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad ni nam
T02D2511:6b-45: mkha'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba las mtshams su
T02D2511:7a-0: ni sgeg mo la sogs pa @7a * //
T02D2511:7a-2: lha thams cad kyi gnas su sna tshogs padma'i gdan
T02D2511:7a-3: la dbus su nam mkha'i mdzod sna tshogs rdo rje
T02D2511:7a-4: bsnams pa'o // phyogs dang mtshams rnams su ni phyag
T02D2511:7a-5: na rdo rje la sogs pa rang gi mtshan ma
T02D2511:7a-6: bsnams pa'o // bsnams pa bya'o // phyi'i mtshams su ni me tog dang /
T02D2511:7a-9: byug pa ma'i lha mo rnams so //
T02D2511:7a-10: shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su ni dong tse
T02D2511:7a-11: dang gser dang mu tig dang rgyan gzhag par bya'o
T02D2511:7a-12: // phyi'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil
T02D2511:7a-13: 'khor dang 'dra ba las de'i nang du de'i phyed
T02D2511:7a-14: kyi tshad kyis phyi'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa dkyil 'khor
T02D2511:7a-15: zur bzhi pa la ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar
T02D2511:7a-17: lha thams cad kyi gnas su sna tshogs padma'i gdan
T02D2511:7a-18: la 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan par byas la
T02D2511:7a-19: / dkyil 'khor dbus ma'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gnod sbyin no //
T02D2511:7a-20: phyogs dang mtshams rnams su ni byang chub sems dpa'
T02D2511:7a-21: chen po phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa brgyad
T02D2511:7a-22: po rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi gzugs can no //
T02D2511:7a-23: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams rnams su ni rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya rnams so //
T02D2511:7a-24: sgo rnams su ni rtse lnga pa'i khro bo rdo
T02D2511:7a-25: rje bsnams pa'i phyag na rdo rje gzhag par bya'o
T02D2511:7a-26: // dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi phyi dang nang du
T02D2511:7a-27: bcas pa dang po'i dkyil 'khor ngang 'dra bar gnas
T02D2511:7a-28: pa las de'i dbus ma'i re'u cha la rdo rje
T02D2511:7a-30: shar gyi re'u cha la sogs pa la ni rdo rje h'um mdzad dang /
T02D2511:7a-31: nam mkha'i snying po dang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /
T02D2511:7a-32: rdo rje khu tshur gyi dkyil 'khor rnams te /
T02D2511:7a-33: shar dang lho dang nub dang byang gi phyogs su bya'o //
T02D2511:7a-34: me la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su ni 'phags pa
T02D2511:7a-35: 'jam dpal dang sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi
T02D2511:7a-36: 'khor lo bskor ba dang nam mkha'i mdzod dang /
T02D2511:7a-37: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi dkyil 'khor rnams mtshams su gnas par bya'o //
T02D2511:7a-38: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams rnams su ni zhi ba mdung gis mtshan pa dang /
T02D2511:7a-41: sring mo bzhi'i dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02D2511:7a-42: phyi'i shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su ni rdo rje sems dpa' dang /
T02D2511:7b-0: 'phags pa @7b spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /
T02D2511:7b-1: nam mkha'i snying po'i rigs bzhi'i mtshan ma'i ngo bo nyid du gnas par bya'o //
T02D2511:7b-2: sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
T02D2511:7b-3: ba'i dkyil 'khor du rigs bzhi'i mtshan ma de nyid
T02D2511:7b-7: dkyil 'khor kun nas zlum po rim pa gsum po
T02D2511:7b-8: la dkyil 'khor dbus ma'i rim pa'i nyis 'gyur ni
T02D2511:7b-11: rim pa gsum pa ste thams cad kyang sgo bzhi
T02D2511:7b-12: pa la mtshams bzhi por mdung rtse gsum pas mtshan
T02D2511:7b-14: de la dbus su dbang phyug chen po'o //
T02D2511:7b-15: de'i logs shar la sogs pa rnams su nag po chen po dang /
T02D2511:7b-18: gar gyi dbang phyug rnams so //
T02D2511:7b-19: me la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su drag po'i thod pa dang /
T02D2511:7b-21: lag na kha tv'am ga dang /
T02D2511:7b-22: ba lad rna'i dbang phyug rnams so //
T02D2511:7b-23: rim pa gnyis pa'i shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams
T02D2511:7b-24: su drag mo lag na mdung rtse gsum pa thogs
T02D2511:7b-25: pa / lhor tshangs ma phreng ba lag na thogs pa'i rgyan can /
T02D2511:7b-26: nub tu khyab 'jug ma lag na 'khor lo thogs pa /
T02D2511:7b-27: byang du gzhon nu ma lag na dril bu thogs pa'o //
T02D2511:7b-28: mtshams rnams su nag mo dang nag mo chen mo dang za byed ma dang /
T02D2511:7b-30: lag na dril bu dang chu gri dang mche ba dang /
T02D2511:7b-35: 'jigs byed ma rnams kyang de nyid du bya'o //
T02D2511:7b-36: shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su dbyig pa'i dbang phyug dang /
T02D2511:7b-39: drag po chen po rnams gnas par bya'o //
T02D2511:7b-41: dkyil 'khor zur bzhi pa sgo byang du bltas par
T02D2511:7b-42: gnas pa la de'i dbus su nag po chen po
T02D2511:7b-43: thod pa dang rus pa'i phreng ba thogs pa kha
T02D2511:7b-45: rim pa gsum pa la 'byung po brgyad dang rim
T02D2511:7b-46: pa brgyad kyis kun nas phreng du bskor nas gnas
T02D2511:7b-47: pa'o // shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams de'i byang gi phyogs nas brtsams te /
T02D2511:7b-48: bskor phyogs su drag po la sogs pa'i mtshan ma sngar bshad pa'i phyogs su dgod par bya'o //
T02D2511:8a-1: kyi dbang ldan nas brtsams te /
T02D2511:8a-2: nag mo dang nag mo chen mo dang /
T02D2511:8a-3: za byed ma dang srin mo'i mtshan ma sngar bshad pa dgod do //
T02D2511:8a-4: sgo rnams su zhi ba dang zhi ba chen mo'o //
T02D2511:8a-5: g-yas kyi phyogs su ni sngar bshad pa'i mtshan ma rnams te /
T02D2511:8a-8: g-yon gyi phyogs su ni sngar bshad pa'i mtshan ma rnams gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2511:8a-10: phyi'i dkyil 'khor zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi par byas la /
T02D2511:8a-11: de'i dbus su gzhu lta bu'i dkyil 'khor gnyis la phyed kyi tshad du byas la /
T02D2511:8a-12: de'i dbus su seng ge'i gdan byas nas /
T02D2511:8a-13: seng ge'i gdan dal ming po gsum rim bzhin du gnas pa stan gcig la 'dug pa bya'o //
T02D2511:8a-14: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi shar gyi sgor grub pa /
T02D2511:8a-18: me'i mtshams su ni gtum pa'o //
T02D2511:8a-19: bden bral gyi mtshams su ni khro ba'o //
T02D2511:8a-20: rlung gi mtshams su ni mchog go //
T02D2511:8a-21: dbang ldan gyi mtshams su ni gsod par gnas par bya'o //
T02D2511:8a-22: ming po gsum gyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2511:8a-23: dkyil 'khor kun nas zlum po la sgo bzhi pa
T02D2511:8a-24: la mtshams bzhi pa'i ri mor ka ba bzhi byas
T02D2511:8a-25: la / dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar cha bzhi gnas pa la /
T02D2511:8a-26: de la shar gyi cha la dga' mo mda' dang
T02D2511:8a-27: gzhu 'dren par brtson pas rang gi sgo la mngon
T02D2511:8a-29: lho'i cha la gsod ma phub dang ral gri 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2511:8a-30: nub tu phag mo gter gyi bum pa lag na thogs pa'o //
T02D2511:8a-31: byang du grub ma tsa sha ka dang gri gug
T02D2511:8a-32: lag na thogs te rang gi sgo la phyogs te
T02D2511:8a-34: rang rang gi mtshan ma thogs te rang gi sgo'i dbus su legs par gnas par bya'o //
T02D2511:8a-35: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dum bu
T02D2511:8a-36: dkyil 'khor bco lnga rnam par phye ba yin no
T02D2511:8a-37: // dum bu gnyis par dkyil 'khor dang po dang
T02D2511:8a-38: 'dra bar phyi nas byas pa'i dkyil 'khor lha thams
T02D2511:8a-39: cad kyi gnas su sna tshogs padma'i gdan rnam par
T02D2511:8a-40: // gzhag la / de'i da bus su rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02D2511:8a-41: de'i mdun du rdo rje yid las byung ba'o //
T02D2511:8a-42: g-yas su rdo rje ki li la'o //
T02D2511:8a-43: rgyab tu chags pa'i rdo rje'o //
T02D2511:8a-44: g-yon du rdo rje snyems pa'o //

T02D2511:18a-1: rnams kyi gnas de ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas te /
T02D2511:18a-2: sems can rnams gdul ba'i phyir rten du 'gyur ba'o //
T02D2511:18a-3: gang gi phyir rab tu dga' ba rnam par dag
T02D2511:18a-4: pa'i gnas des rab tu dga' ba rnam par dag
T02D2511:18a-5: pa la brten te bsgom pa'i stobs kyis gnas de
T02D2511:18a-7: de bas na rab tu dga' ba ni bcom ldan
T02D2511:18a-8: 'das rdo rje sems dpa' yin pas som nyi mi
T02D2511:18a-9: bya'o // de yang de nyid las /
T02D2511:18a-10: kun gyi dam pa dngos grub mchog / dbang phyug chen po thog ma'i lha //
T02D2511:18a-11: rdo rje 'dzin pa rgyal po che //
T02D2511:18a-12: rab tu dga' ba mi 'gyur mchog /
T02D2511:18a-14: shin tu dga' bas na rab tu dga' ba'o zhes bshad de /
T02D2511:18a-15: gsang ba lngas sems can rnams smin pa la spyod par mdzad do zhes bya ba'i don te //
T02D2511:18a-16: de ltar na rab tu dga' ba rnam par dag
T02D2511:18a-17: pa'i gnas 'dis ni rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bo
T02D2511:18a-19: / bud med dang skyes pa'i dbang po gnyis snyoms
T02D2511:18a-20: par 'jug pa'i bde ba dang yid bde ba'i dus
T02D2511:18a-21: kyi rjes thogs la phan tshun kun du chags pa
T02D2511:18a-22: nye bar skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan par bya
T02D2511:18a-23: ba'i phyir / 'dod chags kyi mda' zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2511:18a-24: 'dod chags ni zhen pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
T02D2511:18a-25: 'dod chags nyid mda' yin pas na 'dod chags kyi mda' ste /
T02D2511:18a-26: sems dang sems las byung ba phra mo 'bigs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2511:18a-27: 'dod chags kyi mda'i rnam par dag pa zhes sbyar te /
T02D2511:18a-28: phan tshun kun du chags pa las 'khyud pa dang /
T02D2511:18a-29: reg par byed la reg par gyur pa las ni
T02D2511:18a-30: phan tshun gcig la gcig yongs su mi 'dor ba'i
T02D2511:18a-32: chags par gyur pa las ni phan tshun nye par sbyor ba'i phyir /
T02D2511:18a-33: rgyal po la sogs pa'i longs spyod thams cad kyi
T02D2511:18a-34: dbang phyug gi bdag po ni 'dod chags kyi mdas
T02D2511:18a-35: rnam par bcom pa ni bdag tu 'dzin ba'i rnam
T02D2511:18a-36: pa'i shes rab ni lta ba'o //
T02D2511:18a-37: phan tshun reg pa las kun du byung ba'i mgu ba ni dga' ba'o //
T02D2511:18a-38: chags pas zil gyis non pa rnams ni ma 'ongs
T02D2511:18a-39: pa na 'ang 'bral bar mi 'gyur bar 'dod pa
T02D2511:18a-40: ni sred pa'o // dbang phyug gi gnas kyis myos
T02D2511:18b-0: pa rnams kyi nga rgyal gyi ngo bo @18b nyid
T02D2511:18b-1: ni sred pa'o // ni snyems pa'o // bdag tu
T02D2511:18b-2: lta ba la zhugs pa rnams kyi me tog la
T02D2511:18b-3: sogs pas bdag nyid brgyan pa ni rgyan no //
T02D2511:18b-4: mgu ba dang dga' ba'i 'debs yid tshim pa'o //
T02D2511:18b-5: mngon par sbyor bar 'dod pa'i mar me la sogs pa ni snang ba'o //
T02D2511:18b-6: nga rgyal gyis zil gyis non pa rnams mtho ba
T02D2511:18b-7: las nyams pa ni 'jigs pas khrus la sogs pas
T02D2511:18b-8: lus kyi dri ma bsal ba ni lus kyi bde
T02D2511:18b-9: ba'o // bdag nyid kyi rgyan gyi rgyur gyur ba
T02D2511:18b-10: rab tu dang ba la sogs pa ni gzugs so
T02D2511:18b-11: ba'o // // yid tshim pa thob pa rnams kyis gcig la gcig smra ba ni sgra'o //
T02D2511:18b-12: snang ba yod pas na gcig gis gcig mthong bas dris nyug pa ni dri'o //
T02D2511:18b-13: lus kyi dri ma dang bral nas phan tshun zas snyod pa ni ro'o //
T02D2511:18b-14: de nas de'i rjes su myong ba ste /
T02D2511:18b-15: 'di ni 'khor bar 'jug pa'i rim pa yin no //
T02D2511:18b-16: gang gi tshe rdo rje yid las byung ba la
T02D2511:18b-17: sogs pa nyid 'dod chags kyi mda' zhes bshad pa
T02D2511:18b-18: de'i tshe / rdo rje sems dpa'i bde ba myong
T02D2511:18b-19: ba rnams sam bde ba ma myong ba rnams de
T02D2511:18b-20: thob par 'dod pas yang dang yang du rdo rje
T02D2511:18b-21: sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid la kun du zhen par
T02D2511:18b-24: 'dod chags dam tshig yin par bshad //
T02D2511:18b-27: 'di bsgoms pas kyang rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid mngon sum du byed pa ni reg pa'o //
T02D2511:18b-28: reg pa las ni chos thams cad dngos po med
T02D2511:18b-29: pa'i ngo bo nyid yang dag par skyes pa las
T02D2511:18b-30: kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni ngo bo nyid
T02D2511:18b-32: bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa'i khams gsum pa rnams ni /
T02D2511:18b-33: zo chun gyi rgyud mo ltar 'khor ba ni chos
T02D2511:18b-34: thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du
T02D2511:18b-35: ma mthong ba yin gyi gang bdag gis 'di rnams
T02D2511:18b-36: la lam yang dag par bstan par bya'o zhes bya
T02D2511:18b-37: ba'i snying rje chen po'i mtshan nyid can gyis sems
T02D2511:18b-38: can rnams la chags pa nye bar skye bar 'gyur
T02D2511:18b-39: te / ji ltar rtogs pa'i ye shes nyid dang
T02D2511:18b-40: mi bral bar 'dod pa ni chags pa ste sdug
T02D2511:18b-41: te / pa'o // snying rje chen po gzhan gyi
T02D2511:18b-42: dbang du gyur pas sems can thams cad kyi don
T02D2511:18b-43: te / pa'o // bya ba'i phyir / rdo rje
T02D2511:19a-0: h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i sprul pas thams @19a *
T02D2511:19a-1: te / pa'o // bya ba'i phyir / // cad la dbang phyug dang /
T02D2511:19a-2: dbang rnam par dag pa ni dbang phyug ste /
T02D2511:19a-3: dpang phyug ni longs spyod ma lus pa phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T02D2511:19a-4: dbang ni de la dbang du gyur pa nyid do //
T02D2511:19a-5: bsgom pa la kun du zhen pa rnams kyi yang
T02D2511:19a-6: dag pa'i don rab tu 'byed pa'i shes rab ni
T02D2511:19a-7: lta ba'o // rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid
T02D2511:19a-8: mngon sum du byed pa'i mgu ba ni dga' ba'o
T02D2511:19a-9: lta ba'o // // sdug par sems pa thams cad
T02D2511:19a-10: yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'dod pa ni
T02D2511:19a-11: lta ba'o // // sred pa'o // thams cad la
T02D2511:19a-12: dbang phyug dang rnam par dag pa la gnas pa
T02D2511:19a-13: rnams sems can rnams kyi don bya ba'i phyir bdag
T02D2511:19a-14: nyid las gnyis su med pa nyid du yang dag
T02D2511:19a-15: par ston pa'i dregs pa ni snyems pa ste /
T02D2511:19a-16: spro ba'i mtshan nyid can no //
T02D2511:19a-17: bdag tu lta ba dang bral ba rnams kyi byang
T02D2511:19a-18: chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi mtshan nyid can gyi
T02D2511:19a-20: de nas kyang bar chad med pa'i lam gyi mtshan
T02D2511:19a-21: nyid can gyi shes rab ni yid tshim par byed
T02D2511:19a-22: pa'o // de nas kyang spyan lnga'i rang bzhin can ni snang ba'o //
T02D2511:19a-23: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi mtshan nyid ni lus bde ba'o //
T02D2511:19a-24: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu ni gzugs te /
T02D2511:19a-25: sku des mngon par dad par byas pa'i sems can
T02D2511:19a-26: rnams la pha rol tu phyin pa bcu la sogs
T02D2511:19a-27: pa'i sgra thos par mdzad pa ni sgra'o //
T02D2511:19a-28: de'i don la lhag par mos pa ni dri'o //
T02D2511:19a-29: lha dang ro gcig tu gyur pa'i sems ni ro'o //
T02D2511:19a-30: de nas kyang rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i
T02D2511:19a-31: ngo bo nyid kyis rab tu dga' ba mngon sum
T02D2511:19a-32: du byed do // 'dod chags kyi mda' la sogs
T02D2511:19a-33: pa'i gnas rnams kyis kyang rim pa ci lta ba
T02D2511:19a-34: bzhin du rdo rje yid las byung ba dang ki
T02D2511:19a-45: gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro'i lha mo'i ngo
T02D2511:19a-46: bo nyid du yang dag par ston pa yin te
T02D2511:19a-47: / rab tu dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas bzhin du thams cad la yang bshad par bya'o //
T02D2511:19a-48: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug gdul bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2511:19b-0: btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs pa'i rab tu @19b dga' ba'i skur sprul par mdzad pa dang /
T02D2511:19b-1: de mthong nas 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug rang
T02D2511:19b-2: gi chung ma'i 'khor rnams la sdug bsngal bskyed pa'i
T02D2511:19b-3: blo skyes pa dang bcom ldan 'das la yang mngon
T02D2511:19b-4: par dad pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas so
T02D2511:19b-5: // de lta bas na bcom ldan 'das kyis gzugs
T02D2511:19b-6: rnam par dag pa'i gnas so snyam nas bcom ldan
T02D2511:19b-7: 'das ji ltar na khyed kyi phun sum tshogs pa
T02D2511:19b-8: 'di dag thob par 'gyur zhes zhus pa dang /
T02D2511:19b-9: de'i phyir de gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
T02D2511:19b-10: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la rab tu bkod nas de nyid la dmigs te /
T02D2511:19b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu dga' ba rnam par
T02D2511:19b-12: dag pa'i gnas la sogs pa ston par mdzad pa
T02D2511:19b-13: gang yin pa de ni sgra'o //
T02D2511:19b-14: sgra de thos pa dang de'i don de la lhag
T02D2511:19b-15: par mos pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul khrims ni
T02D2511:19b-17: gal te byang chub sems dpa' 'dod yon lnga spyod kyang //
T02D2511:19b-20: tshul khrims dri ni bla na med //
T02D2511:19b-22: de nyid la lhag par mos pa'i shin tu mthar thug pa ni ro'o //
T02D2511:19b-23: de nas kyang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi
T02D2511:19b-24: me tog gi mtshan nyid can gyi bsam gtan ni
T02D2511:19b-25: rgyan no // de nas kyang nges par 'byed pa'i
T02D2511:19b-26: cha dang ldan pa'i chos rab tu rnam par 'byed
T02D2511:19b-27: pa can gyi mtshan nyid can gyi shes rab ni
T02D2511:19b-29: de nas kyang snang ba thob pa dang snang ba mched pa dang /
T02D2511:19b-30: de kho na nyid kyi don la phyogs gcig pa
T02D2511:19b-31: las byung ba'i bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin
T02D2511:19b-32: gyi mtshan nyid ni snang ba'o //
T02D2511:19b-33: de nyid la yang sems can dang bdag tu lta
T02D2511:19b-34: ba'i rnam par rtog pa la sogs pa de'i dri
T02D2511:19b-35: ma dang bral ba'i lus kyi bde ba'i rgyur gyur
T02D2511:19b-37: de nas bdag med par mthong ba ni lta ba'o //
T02D2511:19b-38: de'i rgyu la rab tu mgu ba ni dga' ba'o //
T02D2511:19b-39: de nas ji ltar mthong ba'i don yang dang yang
T02D2511:19b-40: du mngon sum du byed par mngon par 'dod pa
T02D2511:19b-41: ni sred pa'o // mngon par 'dod par gyur pa de la spro ba'i grags pa ni snyems pa'o //
T02D2511:19b-42: spro bar gyur pa dang yang dang yang du rab
T02D2511:19b-43: tu dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas la kun
T02D2511:19b-44: du zhen par bsgom pa ni 'dod chags kyi mda'o
T02D2511:20a-8: de nas phung po lnga'i mtshan nyid can tshul khrims
T02D2511:20a-9: 'tshal pa la sogs pa'i dri ma dang bral ba
T02D2511:20a-10: chos kyi sku la sogs pa'i rang rang gi ngo
T02D2511:20a-11: bo nyid de mngon sum du byed pa ni reg
T02D2511:20a-12: pa'o // rab tu dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas mngon sum du byas pa dang /
T02D2511:20a-13: de yongs su mi spong ba'i chags pa ni sdug pa'o //
T02D2511:20a-14: des na nyon mongs pa can dang nyon mongs pa
T02D2511:20a-15: can ma yin pa'i rmongs pas skabs mi phyed par
T02D2511:20a-16: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i rnam par thar pa
T02D2511:20a-17: thob pas lhun gyis grub par 'jug pa ni thams
T02D2511:20a-19: dbang rnam par dag pa thob pa ste /
T02D2511:20a-20: bde ba chen po rab tu dga' ba'i bde bas brgyad pa'i dbang phyug tu gyur pa ste /
T02D2511:20a-21: 'di ni de'i sgo'i rim pa yin no //
T02D2511:20a-22: yul spangs pa'i thar pas skrag pa rnams la ni tshul 'di yin te /
T02D2511:20a-23: de rnams kyis 'khor ba'i gzugs mi brtan pa spangs nas /
T02D2511:20a-24: lta bas mi ngoms pa'i gzugs thob ste /
T02D2511:20a-25: bde ba chen po myong bar 'gyur ro zhes nges
T02D2511:20a-26: par dgod par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis
T02D2511:20a-27: ji skad du bshad pa'i gzugs yang dag par ston
T02D2511:20a-28: par mdzad pa ni gzugs so //
T02D2511:20a-29: pi wang la sogs pa'i sgra ni pi wang gi
T02D2511:20a-30: gzugs tsam gyis dga' ba skyed par mi 'gyur te
T02D2511:20a-31: / de bas na pi wang brdungs pa la brtson pa ni sgra'o //
T02D2511:20a-32: de med par yang ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir phyag na dri bsnams pa ni dri'o //
T02D2511:20a-33: bza' ba med par shin tu dga' bar mi 'gyur te /
T02D2511:20a-34: de bas na ro'i snod phyag na bsnams pa ni ro'o //
T02D2511:20a-35: me tog gi rgyan med na de dang 'dra ste /
T02D2511:20a-36: de bas na me tog gi gzugs ne rgyan no //
T02D2511:20a-37: bdug spos med par yid tshim par mi 'gyur te de bas na spos so //
T02D2511:20a-38: mun par ni gcig gis gcig mthong ba med pas
T02D2511:20a-39: de'i phyir de bas na nor bu rin po che
T02D2511:20a-40: la sogs pa'i snang ba phyag na bsnams pa'o //
T02D2511:20a-41: dri byug pa med par lus kyis bde ba'i rgyur mi 'gyur te /
T02D2511:20a-42: de bas na dri byug pa'o //
T02D2511:20a-43: las byed pa'i bran mo dang slas kyi tshogs med par rab tu dga' bar mi 'gyur te /
T02D2511:20a-44: de bas na sgeg mo la sogs pa ste /
T02D2511:20b-0: mig gi chags @20b pa dang lta ba dang dga' ba dang sred pa dang /
T02D2511:20b-1: rab tu dga' ba'i spros pas mtho ba'i snyems pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
T02D2511:20b-2: gzhan ma yin par gyur pa ni 'khyud par byed pa ste /
T02D2511:20b-3: nam yang yongs su spong bar mi byed cing 'di
T02D2511:20b-4: rnams la rnam pa thams cad du dbang du gyur
T02D2511:20b-5: pa nyid kyis rab tu bde ba chen po myong
T02D2511:20b-6: bar 'gyur bas 'dod chags kyi mda' dang /
T02D2511:20b-8: sdug pa'i 'ching ba dang thams cad la dbang phyug
T02D2511:20b-9: dang dbang rnam par dag pa'i rab tu dga' ba'i
T02D2511:20b-10: gnas kyis yang dag par ston par mdzad pa 'di
T02D2511:20b-11: ni 'dod chags dang ldan pa rnams 'dod chags kyis
T02D2511:20b-12: 'dod chags yang dag par spong ba'i rim pa yin
T02D2511:20b-13: no // de skad du dam tshig chen po las
T02D2511:20b-14: dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor la 'jug par bya
T02D2511:20b-15: no // ba'i phyir / rtag tu 'dod la gnas pa yi //
T02D2511:20b-16: lha yi bu ni 'di rnams dang //
T02D2511:20b-17: 'dod chags can ni gzhan gyi phyir //
T02D2511:20b-18: rab dga'i dkyil 'khor bshad pa yin //
T02D2511:20b-21: bin da'i nags ni nyams dga' pa'i //
T02D2511:20b-22: wa nyid gyur kyang mchog yin gyi //
T02D2511:20b-23: goo ta ma yul rnams spangs pa yi //
T02D2511:20b-24: thar pa nam yang mi 'tshal lo //
T02D2511:20b-25: zhes 'byung ste de bas na yon tan yin no //
T02D2511:20b-26: de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs gang gi phyir /
T02D2511:20b-27: rab tu dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas 'di ni /
T02D2511:20b-28: 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so zhes
T02D2511:20b-29: bya ba'i gtam rgyud bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa yin
T02D2511:20b-30: te / de yang 'di ltar chos thams cad ni
T02D2511:20b-31: ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par dag pa ste zhes
T02D2511:20b-32: gsungs te de yang gang gi phyir rab tu dga'
T02D2511:20b-34: ro'i mthar thug pa rnams ni don dam par dngos
T02D2511:20b-35: po med pa'i ngo bo nyid do zhes bya ba'i
T02D2511:20b-36: don to // de lta yin du zin kyang /
T02D2511:20b-37: shes rab yongs su dag pa med par 'di dag ji ltar thob par 'gyur zhe na /
T02D2511:20b-38: de'i phyir chos thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2511:20b-39: chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis dngos po med
T02D2511:20b-40: pa'i ngo bo nyid du gyur pa gang yin pa
T02D2511:20b-41: de nyid ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T02D2511:20b-42: pa yongs su dag pa yin te /
T02D2511:20b-43: chos rnams ni chos nyid las mi 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2511:20b-44: gang gi phyir stong pa nyid kyi sgras shes rab
T02D2511:20b-45: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid yin par bshad
T02D2511:21a-0: de / de pas na rab tu @21a * //
T02D2511:21a-1: dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas 'di ni 'di
T02D2511:21a-2: lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so zhes bya
T02D2511:21a-3: ba nas / ro rnam par dag pa'i gnas 'di
T02D2511:21a-4: ni 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so
T02D2511:21a-5: zhes bya ba'i bar du grub par gyur pa yin
T02D2511:21a-6: ba nas / te / gang gi phyir de mngon
T02D2511:21a-7: sum du byas pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir
T02D2511:21a-8: ba nas / te / ro // da ni phan yon bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2511:21a-9: gang la la zhes bya ba la sogs pa la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
T02D2511:21a-10: chos thams cad ni rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2511:21a-11: de rnams kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa ni snga ma dang 'dra'o //
T02D2511:21a-13: de mngon par bsgrub pa ni mngon sum du byed ces bya ba'i don to //
T02D2511:21a-14: sgrib pa thams cad ces bya ba ni bstan pa'o //
T02D2511:21a-15: mchod pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bshad pa yin te /
T02D2511:21a-16: sgrib pa ni rnam pa lnga ste /
T02D2511:21a-23: the tshom gyi ngo bo nyid dang /
T02D2511:21a-24: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa ni 'dod chags chen po la sogs pa nyon mongs pa rnams so //
T02D2511:21a-25: chos kyi sgrib pa ni 'phags pa'i lam skyes pa'i gegs su gyur pa ste /
T02D2511:21a-26: dam pa'i chos spong ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2511:21a-27: las kyi sgrib pa ni mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa'o //
T02D2511:21a-28: 'dzin pa ni tshig dang don gyi tshul ma brjed par de sems la nges par 'jog pa'o //
T02D2511:21a-29: klog pa ni glegs bam du byas nas klog pa'o //
T02D2511:21a-30: kha ton du byed pa ni dam tshig tu bzung
T02D2511:21a-31: ba de yang dang yang du goms par byed pa'o
T02D2511:21a-32: // tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa ni sems pa dang sgom pa'o //
T02D2511:21a-33: chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid rdo rje 'dzin
T02D2511:21a-34: ni stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin te de

T02D2511:21a-37: de nyid 'bring dang chen po la sogs pa'i dbye bas mgu ba dang /

T02D2511:21a-39: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa

T02D2511:21a-42: don to // de ltar re zhig bcom ldan 'das
T02D2511:21a-43: rnam par snang mdzad kyi rab tu dga' ba rnam
T02D2511:21b-0: par @21b dag pa la sogs pa ston pas dkyil
T02D2511:21b-1: 'khor sbrul par bya ba'i phyir bskul ba dang /

T02D2511:21b-17: de nyid ni dkyil 'khor thams cad ba ste gang
T02D2511:21b-18: gi phyir dkyil 'khor thams cad ni rdo rje sems
T02D2511:21b-19: dpa' yongs su gyur pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i

T02D2511:21b-25: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi ngo bo nyid do //

T02D2511:21b-27: khams gsum mtha' dag ni khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba ste /
T02D2511:21b-28: 'dis ni rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi ngo bo nyid yin no zhes pa'o //
T02D2511:21b-29: 'jig rten gsum po ma lus pa zhes bya ba

T02D2511:21b-33: nyid do // // lag na rdo rje thams cad

T02D2511:21b-35: ma lus pa'i ngo bo nyid do //

T02D2511:21b-38: gtsug to ra la sogs pa ste /
T02D2511:21b-39: rje zhes bya ba ni gtsug tor la sogs pa ste /
T02D2511:22a-0: @22a * // de nyid ni sems can chen po du mas g-yog
T02D2511:22a-1: byas pa gang yin pa de ni rdo rje gsang
T02D2511:22a-2: ba'i sems can chen po du mas g-yog byas pa'o
T02D2511:22a-3: // don ci zhig ston par mdzad ce na /
T02D2511:22a-4: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2511:22a-5: rab tu dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas la
T02D2511:22a-6: sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can zhes bya ba'i don to
T02D2511:22a-7: // de las gzhan yang gang rdo rje dbyings su

T02D2511:22a-10: bshad la de'i dam tshig ni rgyu ste /

T02D2511:22a-13: // de la rang gi bdag nyid kyi de kho
T02D2511:22a-14: na nyid ni rang gi de kho na nyid de
T02D2511:22a-15: rab tu dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i tshul lo
T02D2511:22a-16: // // de nyid ni snying po ste de smras
T02D2511:22a-17: so zhes bya ba ni de ston par byed pa'i
T02D2511:22a-18: sgra gsungs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2511:22a-19: de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhi ba'i tshul rnam
T02D2511:22a-20: par spangs nas rdo rje sems dpa'i sku la sogs
T02D2511:22a-21: pa sgeg pa'i gzugs su 'jog par mdzad cing bcings
T02D2511:22a-22: la / des 'dul ba rnams la gzugs la sogs

T02D2511:22a-26: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings pa'o //
T02D2511:22a-27: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i rdo
T02D2511:22a-28: rje zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D2511:22a-29: cad kyang yin la gsang ba'i rdo rje yang yin
T02D2511:22a-30: pas de skad ces bya ste /
T02D2511:22a-31: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' ni de bzhin
T02D2511:22a-32: gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i ngo bo nyid
T02D2511:22a-34: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ming de skad
T02D2511:22a-35: ces bya ba gang yin pa'i ting nge 'dzin de

T02D2511:22a-37: zhi ba'i tshul spangs nas rdo rje sems dpa'i sku
T02D2511:22a-38: dang gcig tu gyur nas bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i
T02D2511:22a-39: don to // 'og min du mngon par rdzogs par

T02D2511:22a-41: 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su bskor
T02D2511:22a-42: nas bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i don to //

T02D2511:22b-3: rab tu dga' ba rnam par dag pa la sogs pa nas brtsams te /
T02D2511:22b-4: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad gsang ba'i rdo
T02D2511:22b-5: rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
T02D2511:22b-6: bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i bar 'dis dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D2511:22b-7: rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin ston to //
T02D2511:22b-8: ting nge 'dzin gnyis po de dag mngon sum du
T02D2511:22b-9: byas nas bde ba chen po'i gnas la gnas pa'i
T02D2511:22b-10: sngags pas bsdu bar byas te /
T02D2511:22b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las rdo rje 'dzin
T02D2511:22b-12: pa chen po'i dbang bskur ba blangs la rdo rje
T02D2511:22b-13: gzugs la sogs pas dkyil 'khor du de bzhin gshegs
T02D2511:22b-14: pa thams cad bkug nas bcug ste /
T02D2511:22b-15: bcings nas dbang du byas nas /

T02D2511:22b-18: pa nges par sbyar ba ni las kyi mchog ces

T02D2511:22b-22: dpon gyis nges pa kho nar snyoms par 'jug par

T02D2511:22b-24: po'i sbyor ba dang dkyil 'khor gyi mchog dang las
T02D2511:22b-25: kyi mchog gi ting nge 'dzin rnams la snyoms par

T02D2511:22b-27: de nas rgyud phyi ma las gsungs pa'i tshul du
T02D2511:22b-28: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab
T02D2511:22b-29: pas ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug ste /
T02D2511:22b-31: de yang de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni bar ma chad pa ste /
T02D2511:22b-32: gsol ba btab pa'i rjes thogs la zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2511:22b-33: gsang ba yang yin la chen po yang yin pas gsang ba chen po ste /
T02D2511:22b-34: de nyid rdo rje yin pas na gsang ba chen po'i rdo rje'o //
T02D2511:22b-35: gsang ba chen po'i rdo rje nyid dam tshig yin
T02D2511:22b-36: pas na gsang ba chen po'i rdo rje'i dam tshig
T02D2511:22b-37: ste / dam tshig ni dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2511:22b-38: de las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa'i
T02D2511:22b-39: ye shes gang las byung ba'i ye shes gang yin
T02D2511:22b-40: pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2511:22b-41: de nyid ni phyag rgya ste /
T02D2511:22b-42: ming de skad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de la snyoms par zhugs pa ste /
T02D2511:23a-1: 'khor gyi rnam par thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad ces bya ba'i don to //

T02D2511:23a-6: ming de nyid ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor de nyid
T02D2511:23a-7: gang yin pa de gsungs pa ni bka' stsal to

T02D2511:23a-14: yang dag pa dang bcas par rab tu phye ba bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2511:23a-15: ci zhig ce na dkyil 'khor chen po ste /

T02D2511:23a-19: dbyibs ji lta bu zhe na dam pa zhes bya ba ste /
T02D2511:23a-20: mchog ces bya ba'i don to //

T02D2511:23a-24: ming de skad ces bya ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2511:23a-25: dbyibs ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D2511:23a-26: grub zhir bgyi zhing zhes bya ba ste /
T02D2511:23a-27: grva bzhi dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i don to//
T02D2511:23a-28: khyams rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba zhes bya ba
T02D2511:23a-29: ni gzhal yas khang gi phyi rol kun nas bskor
T02D2511:23a-30: phyogs su khyams kyis bskor ba la ni khyams rnams
T02D2511:23a-32: rdo rje rin po che dang /
T02D2511:23a-34: sna tshogs rdo rje ni rdo rje kun no //
T02D2511:23a-35: sna tshogs pa'i ba dan gyi rtse mor dril bu'i
T02D2511:23a-36: mchog btags pa gang yin pa de la de skad
T02D2511:23a-37: ces bya'o // de ltar phyi'i dkyil 'khor bris nas
T02D2511:23a-38: de'i nang du dkyil 'khor gnyis pa de'i phyed kyi
T02D2511:23a-39: ces bya'o // tshad la / phyi'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra bar sgo bzhi dang ldan pa /

T02D2511:23b-1: de nyid phyi rol du rdo rje phreng ba zlum pos bskor bar bya'o //
T02D2511:23b-2: de nas lha thams cad kyi gnas su padma'i gdan bri bar bya'o //
T02D2511:23b-3: sangs rgyas sku ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D2511:23b-4: rdo rje sems dpa'i sku gzugs te //
T02D2511:23b-5: sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin phyir bshad //
T02D2511:23b-8: rdo rje phreng ba la sogs kyis spras shing zhes
T02D2511:23b-9: bya ba ni rdo rje'i phreng bas mdzes par byas
T02D2511:23b-10: pa'o // sogs pa'i sgras ni padma dang rin po
T02D2511:23b-11: che dang sangs rgyas kyi phreng ba gzung bar bya
T02D2511:23b-12: pa'o // ste / rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs can yin pa'i phyir /
T02D2511:23b-13: dbang bskur ba'i ngo bo nyid ni phreng ba yin te /
T02D2511:23b-14: dkyil 'khor gnyis par de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bstan pas 'dir yang som nyi mi bya'o //
T02D2511:23b-15: mdun du rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni rdo rje yid las byung ba ste /
T02D2511:23b-16: phyag g-yon na gzhu bsnams pa phyag g-yas kyi mthe
T02D2511:23b-17: bo dang mdzub mo gnyis kyis rdo rje mda' 'dren
T02D2511:23b-18: pa la brtson par mdzad pa'o //
T02D2511:23b-19: g-yas su ni rdo rje ki li ki la dkar ser rdo rje dmar po bsnams pa'o //
T02D2511:23b-20: yan lag kun gyis yongs 'khyud ces bya ba sku kun gyis yongs su 'khyud pa'o //
T02D2511:23b-22: rdo rje gzugs te zhes bya ba ste /
T02D2511:23b-23: rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i gzugs can ni //
T02D2511:23b-24: sku mdog ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D2511:23b-25: nyi ma'i 'od ces bya ba ste /
T02D2511:23b-26: nyi ma'i 'od kyis mdangs dmar por snang ba'o //
T02D2511:23b-27: rgyab tu ni rdo rje 'dod pa chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan thogs pa /
T02D2511:23b-28: sku mdog ljang ser dang ldan par ci rigs par blo dang ldan pas gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2511:23b-29: g-yon du rdo rje snyems pa rdo rje khu tshur
T02D2511:23b-30: gnyis kyis rdo rje snyems pa'i tshul gnyis 'dzin pa
T02D2511:23b-31: btso ma'i gser gyi 'od 'dra ba dgod par bya'o
T02D2511:23b-32: // mtshams rnams su ni spyi gtsug tu thal mo
T02D2511:23b-33: kha phye bas me tog dang bdug spos dang mar
T02D2511:23b-34: me dang dri 'dzin pa rdo rje yid las byung
T02D2511:23b-35: ba la sogs pa'i sku mdog dang mthun pa rdo

T02D2511:23b-39: / rdo rje thogs pa'i lag pas gar byed pa'i sgeg mo la sogs pa bri bar bya'o //
T02D2511:23b-40: shar phyogs kyi sgor ni rdo rje gzugs phyag na me long bsnams pa ste /
T02D2511:24a-0: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sems @24a * //
T02D2511:24a-1: dpa' thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan skyed pa'i rgyur gyur pa'o //
T02D2511:24a-2: lhor ni sgra pi bang brdung pa la brtson pa'o //
T02D2511:24a-4: dri'i snod phyag na bsnams pa'o //
T02D2511:24a-5: byang du ni ro'i snod phyag na bsnams pa'o //
T02D2511:24a-6: nang gi sgo rnams la yang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o//
T02D2511:24a-7: de ltar me long dang pi wang dang dri'i snod dang /
T02D2511:24a-8: ro'i snod kyi mtshan ma rnams ni dam tshig chen
T02D2511:24a-9: po dang khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba la sogs
T02D2511:24a-10: pa'i rgyud rnams la ston pas 'dir som nyi mi

T02D2511:24a-12: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i 'khor gyis bskor ba sngar bshad pa'i tshul du bri bar bya'o //
T02D2511:24a-13: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang gi snam bu la 'dod
T02D2511:24a-14: pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug dang tshangs pa dang khyab
T02D2511:24a-15: 'jug dang karti ka dang dbang po dang bde byed
T02D2511:24a-16: chung ma dang bcas par kun du bri bar bya
T02D2511:24a-17: ste / gang gi phyir mchog gi sgras ni khyab 'jug dang /
T02D2511:24a-18: karti ka dang dbang po yin par mngon par 'dod do //
T02D2511:24a-19: lho phyogs su ni zla ba dang nyi ma dang
T02D2511:24a-20: sben pa dang mig dmar chung ma dang bcas pa
T02D2511:24a-21: rnams so // nub phyogs su ni gtun dang rlung
T02D2511:24a-22: lha dang me lha dang lus ngan po chung ma
T02D2511:24a-23: rnams so // dang bcas pa'o // byang gi phyogs
T02D2511:24a-24: su ni phag dang gshin rje dang tshogs kyi bdag
T02D2511:24a-25: po chung ma dang bcas pa'o //
T02D2511:24a-26: sgo rnams su ni stobs bzangs dang sbrang rtsis myos
T02D2511:24a-27: pa dang rgyal ba dang rgyal ba thob pa chung
T02D2511:24a-28: ma dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o //
T02D2511:24a-29: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa 'di dag thams
T02D2511:24a-30: cad kyang rdo rje h'um zlos shing bri bar bya'o
T02D2511:24a-31: // sgo ni thams cad kyang cha brgyad par bya'o //
T02D2511:24a-32: de ltar dkyil 'khor legs par bris nas tha ma
T02D2511:24a-33: rnams spos chus byugs la me tog gi sil ma
T02D2511:24a-34: bkram ste / bum pa dang bum pa gang ba
T02D2511:24a-35: bzhag la mchod yon mngon par bzlas pa byas nas
T02D2511:24a-36: bkram ste / / rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi mdzub mo lcags kyu gnyis su byas la /
T02D2511:24a-37: mkhrig ma gnyis rdo rje bcings pa gnyis bsnol la /
T02D2511:24a-38: rdo rje se gol brdab pa byas pas dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba dang /
T02D2511:24a-39: sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya'o //
T02D2511:24a-40: de nas myur du phyag rgya che //
T02D2511:24a-41: rdo rje sems dpa'i rten byed cing //
T02D2511:24b-0: @24b mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa yin //
T02D2511:24b-1: lan cig bar du brjod par bya //
T02D2511:24b-2: dpal mchog dang po'i sems dpa' ste //
T02D2511:24b-3: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2511:24b-4: rdo rje can ni mdun gnas te //
T02D2511:24b-5: sems dpa'i skyil krung gis legs gnas //
T02D2511:24b-6: bde chen rdo rje bzang po mchog / bdag po
T02D2511:24b-7: lan gcig yang dag 'gug / yi ge h'um nyid
T02D2511:24b-8: dang dang po'i rdo rje mnyam par gzhag pa dang
T02D2511:24b-10: dbus ma'i rdo rje lcags kyu gnyis dang dgug pa'i
T02D2511:24b-11: sbyor bas snying po dang rang gi lcags kyus dgug
T02D2511:24b-12: par bya'o // de nas rdo rje'i mchod yon dbul bar bya ste /
T02D2511:24b-13: yi ge h'um nyid dang rdo rje'i me tog gi
T02D2511:24b-14: thal mo kha phye ba'i mchod yon gyi phyag rgya
T02D2511:24b-15: bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa'i thugs ka'i zla
T02D2511:24b-16: ba'i rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2511:24b-17: dza: h'um bam ho: zhes brjod la /
T02D2511:24b-18: h'um gi mthar bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa
T02D2511:24b-19: legs par bzhag la de nyid brjod cing rdo rje'i
T02D2511:24b-21: yi ge h'um gis ljags la rdo rje bzang po bskyed de /
T02D2511:24b-22: bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa'i thugs ka'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la yi ge h'um bkod la /
T02D2511:24b-23: yi ge aa las rang gi snying gar sna tshogs
T02D2511:24b-24: rdo rje bskyed la gar las byung ba ni las
T02D2511:24b-26: thams cad la bstan par bya'o //
T02D2511:24b-27: bde ba'i thugs mchog kun la rjes su chags //
T02D2511:24b-28: rdo rje sems khyod rab tu bde ba'i mchog / bde ba chen po bstan zhing mtho bar mdzod //
T02D2511:24b-29: grub par byed cing myur du 'dud par bgyi //
T02D2511:24b-30: zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i glu len pa dang /
T02D2511:24b-31: ba dan gsum pa rtse gsum can //
T02D2511:24b-32: bsgyings bcas mtha' nas dgrol ba dang //
T02D2511:24b-33: mdun du bskor zhing glog ltar gdeg / de ni rdo rje'i gar zhes bshad //
T02D2511:24b-34: de nas rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la g-yon pa dkur bsten nas /
T02D2511:24b-35: g-yas pas 'degs pa'i tshul gyis snying gar 'jog pa ni las kyi phyag rgya'o//
T02D2511:24b-36: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis mda' 'phen pa'i tshul
T02D2511:24b-37: du byed pa ni rdo rje yid las byung ba'o
T02D2511:24b-38: // rdo rje khu tshur gnyis po de nyid kyis rang la 'khyud pa ni ki li ki la'o //
T02D2511:24b-39: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis po de nyid kyis rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i tshul du byed pa ni /
T02D2511:25a-0: rdo rje khu tshur de nyid bkan te bzhag @25a * //
T02D2511:25a-1: pa gnyis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi las kyi phyag rgya gnyis lta bu ni rdo rje snyems pa'i'o //
T02D2511:25a-2: rdo rje thal mo gnyis bskor la /
T02D2511:25a-3: snying ga'i phyogs su byug pa ltar bya ba ni rdo rje dgun gyi'o //
T02D2511:25a-4: mdud pa byas nas spyi bor bzhag nas phab ste /
T02D2511:25a-5: 'thor ba ltar byas pa ni rdo rje sbrang rtsi'o //
T02D2511:25a-6: de nyid du thur du ldugs pa ltar byed pa ni rdo rje sprin no //
T02D2511:25a-7: de nyid las mthe bo bsnyams nas bskor ba ni rdo rje ston gyi'o //
T02D2511:25a-8: de nyid shin tu brkyang nas byug pa ni rdo rje dgun gyi'o //
T02D2511:25a-9: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i sa gnon pa'i phyag rgya ni rgyud phyi ma la blta bar bya'o //
T02D2511:25a-10: rdo rje mda' ni rdo rje sems dpa'i las kyi phyag rgya nyid do //
T02D2511:25a-11: 'phags pa 'jam dpal la sogs pa byang chub sems
T02D2511:25a-12: dpa' bdun gyi phyag rgya ni de rnams nyid kyi
T02D2511:25a-14: phyi rol gyi mtshams rnams su rdo rje thal mo snying gar bskor ba ni sgog mo'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2511:25a-15: de nyid g-yon nas bskor te /
T02D2511:25a-16: spyi bor bzhag pa ni bzhad pa mo'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2511:25a-17: de nyid las g-yon pa'i mdzub mo bkug pa yu
T02D2511:25a-18: bar byas la g-yas pa'i mdzub mo bkug pas pi
T02D2511:25a-19: wang brdung ba'i tshul du byed pa ni rdo rje
T02D2511:25a-21: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis gar byas nas spyi
T02D2511:25a-22: bor rdo rje thal mo bcing ba ni rdo rje
T02D2511:25a-24: rdo rje bsdams pa bsnyems pa'i mthil la lta ba ni rdo rje gzugs kyi'o //
T02D2511:25a-25: rdo rje bsdams pa'i mdzub mo g-yon pa yu bar
T02D2511:25a-26: byas pa la mdzub mo g-yas pa bkug nas brdung
T02D2511:25a-27: ba ni sgra'i'o // rdo rje bsdams pa brkyang bas snying gar byug pa ni dri'o //
T02D2511:25a-28: rdo rje bsdams pa nyid bsdams nas bkan la ro'i
T02D2511:25a-29: snod ltar bya ba ni ro rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o
T02D2511:25a-30: // de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa
T02D2511:25a-31: rnams sangs rgyas kyi rin po che'i dbang bskur bas
T02D2511:25a-33: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2511:25a-34: rnams ni rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur bas
T02D2511:25a-36: de nas bum pa gang ba dang me tog la
T02D2511:25a-37: sogs pa ci snyed pa rnams kyis yang dag par
T02D2511:25a-39: de la sogs par bya bar blta bar bya'o //
T02D2511:25b-0: de ltar dkyil 'khor @25b rdzogs par byas nas /
T02D2511:25b-1: de nas dkyil 'khor 'dir zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston te /
T02D2511:25b-2: de nas zhes bya ba ni de'i rjes thogs la'o //
T02D2511:25b-3: 'dir zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor 'dir ro //
T02D2511:25b-4: 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga ni dbab pa dang dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D2511:25b-5: snying po 'dzin du gzhug pa rnams ni stsogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgras ston to //
T02D2511:25b-7: rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyi bar du thob par 'gyur te /
T02D2511:25b-8: de ni de la dang po nyid du zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston to //
T02D2511:25b-9: de la dang po nyid du ji skad du bshad pa'i tshogs zhugs pa'i slob dpon ni /
T02D2511:25b-10: rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs su sbyin gyis brlabs la /
T02D2511:25b-11: phyag bzhi bya ba sngon du 'gro bas sdom pa bzung la /
T02D2511:25b-12: sgor bzhag pa'i bum pa'i chu yi ge h'um sngon por bzlas pas dbang bskur te /
T02D2511:25b-13: gos dmar po la sogs pa bgo'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2511:25b-14: rdo rje chen po'i slob dpon zhes bya ba ni
T02D2511:25b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2511:25b-16: gyi slob dpon du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro
T02D2511:25b-18: dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi slob dpon dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2511:25b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2511:25b-20: dam tshig thams cad shes pa dang zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rigs kyi slob dpon du'o //
T02D2511:25b-21: chos thams cad rig pa dang zhes bya ba ni padma'i rigs kyi slob dpon du'o //
T02D2511:25b-22: las thams cad bsgrub pa dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2511:25b-23: rin po che'i rigs kyi slob dpon no //
T02D2511:25b-24: dngos grub thams cad grub pa dang zhes bya ba
T02D2511:25b-25: ni rdo rje khu tshur la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2511:25b-26: gyi slob dpon nyid du 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes
T02D2511:25b-28: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas byin gyis brlabs
T02D2511:25b-29: pa dang zhes bya ba ni nges pa thams cad
T02D2511:25b-30: dang ldan par mdzad do zhes bya ba'i don to
T02D2511:25b-31: // gang gi phyir de ltar 'gyur ba des na de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
T02D2511:25b-34: las kyi rigs kyi dbang bskur ba thams cad thob par 'gyur ba dang /
T02D2511:25b-35: 'di la rigs thams cad shes pa dang ldan pa mngon du phyogs par 'gyur ro //
T02D2511:26a-0: mchod pa thams cad dang zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems @26a * //
T02D2511:26a-1: dpa' rnams dang lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mchod par 'os pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2511:26a-2: byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa'i gnas kyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
T02D2511:26a-6: las kyi rigs rtogs par 'gyur bar ston pa yin la /
T02D2511:26a-7: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pas ni /
T02D2511:26a-8: rdo rje khu tshur gyi dkyil 'khor grub pa'i ye shes ston te /
T02D2511:26a-9: 'di'i snying la zhugs shing don yod pa'i phyir zhes
T02D2511:26a-10: bya ba ni thogs pa med pa'i nus pa dang
T02D2511:26a-11: ldan par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2511:26a-12: rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings la zhes bya ba ni
T02D2511:26a-13: dang po'i rdo rje ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya ste
T02D2511:26a-14: / de'i mtshan nyid ni 'di yin no //
T02D2511:26a-15: lnga po bsdus pa bcings nas ni //
T02D2511:26a-16: gung bsgreng srin lag nang du gzhug / mthe bong mthe chung bsnyams rdo rje //
T02D2511:26a-17: de ni dang po'i rdo rje mchog / ces bya ba'o //
T02D2511:26a-18: rdo rje'i lta ba ni kun du chags shing rab tu dga' bas mig gdangs pa'o //
T02D2511:26a-19: snying po lan cig brjod nas zhes bya ba ni yi ge h'um ngo //
T02D2511:26a-20: bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad pa'i
T02D2511:26a-21: tshul nyid kyis dam tshig gi phyag rgyas gzhag par
T02D2511:26a-22: bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2511:26a-23: rdo rje rnam par sgeg pa'i zhes bya ba la
T02D2511:26a-24: sogs pa ni rnam par sgeg pa'i dga' ba'i rdo
T02D2511:26a-25: rje zhes bya ba'i don to /
T02D2511:26a-26: 'di yang rdo rje gar dang bcas pa'i mchod pas
T02D2511:26a-27: rnam par 'gyur zhing 'dzum pa dang bcas pa'i mig
T02D2511:26a-29: rdo rje sems dpa' yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su mnyes par phyag bya'o //
T02D2511:26a-30: rdo rje thal mos rdo rje'i gar byed cing bskor
T02D2511:26a-31: bas snying gar me tog thogs te bdag nyid 'jug
T02D2511:26a-32: par bya'o zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i
T02D2511:26a-33: sbyor bas / badzra badzra zhes smras shing /
T02D2511:26a-34: yi ge h'um yang zlos bzhin du 'jug par bya'o //
T02D2511:26a-35: de bzhin du 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2511:26a-36: sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis 'dug la /
T02D2511:26a-37: de bzhin du phyag rgya chen po bcings la yi
T02D2511:26a-38: ge h'um zlos shing ji srid bcom ldan 'das ji
T02D2511:26a-39: skad du bshad pa'i mtshan ma ston par mdzad pa
T02D2511:26a-40: de srid kyi bar du bya'o zhes bya ba'i don
T02D2511:26b-0: to // bya ba thams cad @26b ni 'dir yi ge h'um nyid kyis bya ba yin no //
T02D2511:26b-1: rab tu dga' ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni lnga po'i bsdus pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2511:26b-2: gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa la /
T02D2511:26b-3: mos pa de rnams kyis kyang rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams dang /
T02D2511:26b-4: rang gi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i cho gas 'jug
T02D2511:26b-5: par bya zhing dbang bskur ba la sogs pa'i cho
T02D2511:26b-7: phyag rgya rnams kyis rgyas gdab par bya ste /
T02D2511:26b-8: phyag rgya rnams ni rgyas 'debs par byed pa yin no //
T02D2511:26b-9: de yang ci ste zhe na gzugs brnyan gyi tshul
T02D2511:26b-10: du de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i phyag rgya
T02D2511:26b-11: rnams gdul bya rnams la skyed par byed pa yin
T02D2511:26b-12: no // bde ba chen po rdo rje'i dam tshig
T02D2511:26b-13: ces bya ba ni bde ba yang yin la chen
T02D2511:26b-14: po yang yin pas bde ba chen po ste /
T02D2511:26b-15: zag pa med pa'i rgyun dang ldan pa'i bde ba dang /
T02D2511:26b-17: de'i rgyu mthun pa las 'byung ba'i rdo rje sems dpa'i sku la rdo rje'i sgrar bshad de /
T02D2511:26b-18: dper na bden par smra ba la bden par smra ba po zhes zer ba lta bu'o //
T02D2511:26b-19: de'i dam tshig ni dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2511:26b-20: rdo rje chos kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2511:26b-21: la gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa
T02D2511:26b-22: dang bral ba'i sems kyi gsang ba ni rdo rje
T02D2511:26b-23: chos yin la / de rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid ni de kho na nyid de /
T02D2511:26b-24: de rgyur gyur pas sems can gyi khams ma lus
T02D2511:26b-25: shing lus pa med par phyag rgyas rgyas gdab par
T02D2511:26b-26: byed pa 'di ni dam tshig go //
T02D2511:26b-27: rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya lnga po
T02D2511:26b-28: bsdus pa bcings la byin gyis brlab par bya ste
T02D2511:26b-29: bzlas brjod bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02D2511:26b-30: rdo rje bri ba'i phyag rgya ni 'phags pa rdo rje dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2511:26b-31: phyag rgya dgrol la zhes bya ba ni ngal bar gyur na /
T02D2511:26b-32: phyag rgya dam pa bcing bar ma byas par yang bzlas brjod bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2511:26b-33: dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa tsam gyis zhes bya ba ni sngon du bsnyen pa med par te /
T02D2511:26b-34: rim pa 'di ni ye shes babs par gyur pa yin no //
T02D2511:26b-35: gzhan dag gi ni mtshan ma thob par gyur pas na /
T02D2511:26b-36: las rnams 'grub par 'gyur ba yin no //
T02D2511:26b-37: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i bde ba thams cad phul
T02D2511:26b-38: bas so zhes bya ba la 'dod chags thog mar
T02D2511:27a-0: @27a * // ba ste / pa ston to / 'dod chags dam tshig yin par bshad //
T02D2511:27a-2: zhes rgyud phyi ma'i las ston pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2511:27a-3: de yang rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa bsgoms pas dub par gyur na /
T02D2511:27a-4: phyag bzhi yang dang yang du byas pas ngal ba
T02D2511:27a-5: bsal ba ni bde ba thams cad phul ba ste
T02D2511:27a-6: / phyag bzhi'i mchod pa phul bas grub par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2511:27a-7: de yang 'di ni rang gi sems brtan par bya ba yin te /
T02D2511:27a-8: de lta bus ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2511:27a-11: sgrub pa'i sbyor bas rjes mnyes pa //
T02D2511:27a-12: rdo rje sems dpa' nyid ni yin par bshad //
T02D2511:27a-14: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i bsgom pas bde bar gyur na /
T02D2511:27a-15: bde ba 'dis sems can thams cad bde bar gyur cig ces bya ba ni phul ba yin no //
T02D2511:27a-16: rdo rje sems dpa' dang 'khyud cing 'o byed pas
T02D2511:27a-17: so zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' mdun
T02D2511:27a-18: du bzhugs su gsol te bcings la ;
T02D2511:27a-20: 'khyud pa dang 'o byed pa la sogs pa'i phyag rgya ni /
T02D2511:27a-22: yang na khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i mchog las
T02D2511:27a-23: btus pa'i bzlas pa'i rnam pa yin par bstan te
T02D2511:27a-24: / gzugs de la ni bzhugs bzhin nam zhes bshad pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2511:27a-25: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pas /
T02D2511:27a-26: de bsam pas yi ge h'um nyid dpag tu med
T02D2511:27a-27: par bzlas pas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rjes
T02D2511:27a-28: su mnyes par byas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2511:27a-29: rdo rje thams cad ni rdo rje yid las byung ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D2511:27a-30: de rnams kyis ni aom na mo bha ba badzra
T02D2511:27a-31: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rang gi snying po
T02D2511:27a-32: bzlas pas nang gi dbang du gyur pa nyid du
T02D2511:27a-33: byas pa ni rjes su mnyes par byas par 'gyur
T02D2511:27a-34: ro // lha zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2511:27a-35: brgya byin la sogs pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi mdun du
T02D2511:27b-0: de rjes su chags par bya ba'i @27b bsam pas
T02D2511:27b-1: yi ge h'um bzlas brjod 'bum byas na /
T02D2511:27b-2: de nas de rjes su chags pas bdag nyid kyi thams cad nye bar stobs par 'gyur ro //
T02D2511:27b-3: gnod sbyin mo la sogs pa yang chung ma la
T02D2511:27b-4: sogs pa'i gzugs kyis bdag nyid stobs par byed do
T02D2511:27b-5: // bdag bsrung ba la ni yungs kar h'um las
T02D2511:27b-6: rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i gzugs su bskyed la rang
T02D2511:27b-8: rdo rje 'bar ba'i nang du bdag nyid tshud par
T02D2511:27b-9: bsams na bdag nyid bsrung bar byas par 'gyur ro
T02D2511:27b-10: // gzhan bsrung ba ni g-yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje rtse lnga pa blangs la /
T02D2511:27b-11: pha rol gyi yan lag dang nyid lag thams cad
T02D2511:27b-12: du rdo rjer bya ba'i bsam pas h'um zlos shing
T02D2511:27b-13: rdo rje bskor bas bya ste /
T02D2511:27b-14: de lta bus ni gzhan bsrung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2511:27b-15: 'on te skye bo'i tshogs chen po srung bar byed par 'dod pa des /
T02D2511:27b-16: yid kyi rdo rje bsams la /
T02D2511:27b-17: de rnams kyi yan lag dang nyid lag rnams su
T02D2511:27b-18: de bzhin du bskor zhing phur bu dang mtshams dang
T02D2511:27b-19: / dkyil 'khor gyi ra ba la sogs pa'i tshul du byas pas bsrung bar bya'o //
T02D2511:27b-20: de bzhin du mig gnyis su yi ge h'um las rdo rje bskyed la /

T02D2511:29b-31: cing h'um phat zlos pa 'di ni /
