T02D2511:30b-37: rdo rje 'khor lo ni 'og nas bshad pa'i rdo
T02D2511:30b-38: rje 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor des dkyil 'khor thams cad
T02D2511:31a-0: bsgrub par bya'o // dang po'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya @31a * //
T02D2511:31a-1: ni bde ba chen po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2511:31a-2: rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje zhes bshad pa ni
T02D2511:31a-3: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i las kyi phyag
T02D2511:31a-4: rgya'o // gang lag pa g-yas pa'i mdzub mo lcags
T02D2511:31a-5: kyur bya ba ni rdo rje bsnyems pa'i lcags kyu'i
T02D2511:31a-6: rgya'o // phyag rgya'o // dang po'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya nyid ni rdo rje grub pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2511:31a-7: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen por bsams la /
T02D2511:31a-8: zla ba'i gzugs la gnas nas ni //
T02D2511:31a-9: nam mkha'i steng du 'dug nas su //
T02D2511:31a-10: lag tu rdo rje bsgoms na ni //
T02D2511:31a-12: zhes bya ba 'di ni rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2511:31a-13: rig pa thams cad kyi mchog gi phyag rgya ni
T02D2511:31a-14: dang po'i rdo rje nyid rdo rje phra mo'i sbyor
T02D2511:31a-15: ba shin tu mnyam par gzhag la bsgom par bya'o
T02D2511:31a-16: // byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bsgom pa la
T02D2511:31a-17: ni thugs kyi phyag rgyas so zhes bya ba ni
T02D2511:31a-18: gang thugs kyi rdo rje 'di nyid kyis byang chub
T02D2511:31a-19: sems dpa' thams cad bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2511:31a-20: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po ni go sla'o //
T02D2511:31a-21: byang chub mchog gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya ste des sangs rgyas nyid bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2511:31a-22: dpal mchog dang po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T02D2511:31a-23: phyin pa'i dum bu las rab tu dga' ba'i rdo
T02D2511:31a-24: rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'grel pa mdor bshad pa rdzogs
T02D2511:31a-26: / rang bzhin mnyam zhing cha mnyam pa la spyod
T02D2511:31a-27: pa'i sems can rnams rjes su gzung bar bya ba'i
T02D2511:31a-28: phyir / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor ston par
T02D2511:31a-29: mdzad par bzhed pas de rnams zhes bya ba la
T02D2511:31a-30: sogs par nye bar dgod par mdzad pa yin te
T02D2511:31a-31: phyir / / de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa ste /
T02D2511:31a-32: rab tu dga' ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rjes su thogs la zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2511:31a-33: yang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni slar yang zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2511:31a-34: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhi ba'i chos
T02D2511:31a-35: nyid ni de bzhin nyid du ro gcig pa'i ye
T02D2511:31a-36: shes te / zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
T02D2511:31a-37: de nyid ni mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ste /
T02D2511:31a-38: de mngon par bsgrub cing mngon sum du mdzad par
T02D2511:31a-39: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gang
T02D2511:31b-0: gis 'gyur ba 'di nyid @31b ston par mdzad cing
T02D2511:31b-1: gsungs pa'o // rdo rje rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid yin pas na rdo rje mnyam pa nyid de /
T02D2511:31b-2: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dang bral ba nyid do //
T02D2511:31b-3: de bas na rdo rje'i sgras ni sems dang sems
T02D2511:31b-4: las byung ba gnyis su med pa nyid yin par
T02D2511:31b-6: de'i mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni mngon sum du byed pa'o //
T02D2511:31b-7: de nyid ni byang chub po //
T02D2511:31b-8: gtan tshigs gang gi phyir zhe na /
T02D2511:31b-9: rdo rje sra ba nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2511:31b-10: gang gi phyir de bzhin nyid dang stong pa nyid dang /
T02D2511:31b-11: 'dus ma byas pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas rdo rje de ni ro gcig pa'i ye shes te /
T02D2511:31b-12: de thob pas srog chags dang srog chags ma yin pa rnams dang /
T02D2511:31b-13: 'dod chags dang zhe sdang la sogs pa gnyis su rtog pa rnams kyis mi phyed pas na /
T02D2511:31b-14: rdo rje ltar sra ba yin te /
T02D2511:31b-15: de bas na rdo rje sra ba nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2511:31b-16: don zhes bya ba'i sgras ni gzugs la sogs pa'i don no //
T02D2511:31b-17: yul rnams la bya bar bshad la /
T02D2511:31b-18: don rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid ni don gyi mnyam pa nyid de /
T02D2511:31b-19: don dam par dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
T02D2511:31b-20: yang na bdag gi rnam pa'i nyon mongs pa can gyi yid ni don yin la /
T02D2511:31b-21: de de'i mnyam pa nyid yin pas na don gyi mnyam pa nyid de snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2511:31b-22: de mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa yang snga ma dang 'dra'o //
T02D2511:31b-23: de nyid ni byang chub chen po yang yin no //
T02D2511:31b-25: don gcig pa nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba ste /
T02D2511:31b-26: don gcig pa ni de bzhin nyid yin la /
T02D2511:31b-27: don gcig pa'i dngos por gyur pas na don gcig pa nyid ces bya ba ste /
T02D2511:31b-28: de rgyur gyur pas don gyi mnyam pa nyid mngon
T02D2511:31b-29: par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni byang chub chen
T02D2511:31b-30: po'o // chos zhes bya ba ni lung gi chos te /
T02D2511:31b-31: theg pa gsum la sogs pa bshad pa'i tshul lam
T02D2511:31b-32: yang na byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu
T02D2511:31b-33: rtsa bdun dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa la sogs pa ni chos so //
T02D2511:31b-34: de rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid ni snga ma bzhin du blta bar bya'o //
T02D2511:31b-35: 'di'i mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa yang snga
T02D2511:31b-36: ma bzhin du bshad par bya ste de nyid ni
T02D2511:31b-38: gtan tshigs gang gi phyir zhe na /
T02D2511:32a-1: kyis rnam par dag pa'i phyir zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2511:32a-2: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang
T02D2511:32a-3: bral ba nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba'i don to
T02D2511:32a-4: // thams cad ni mig dang rna ba dang sna
T02D2511:32a-5: dang lce dang lus dang yid kyi tshogs rnams te
T02D2511:32a-6: // / de rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid ni thams
T02D2511:32a-7: cad kyi mnyam pa nyid de dngos po med pa'i
T02D2511:32a-9: de'i mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni rtogs par gyur pa'o //
T02D2511:32a-10: de nyid ni byang chub chen po ste /
T02D2511:32a-11: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub chen po la ltos na byang chub kyang yin la /
T02D2511:32a-12: chen po yang yin pas na byang chub chen po ste /
T02D2511:32a-13: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo //
T02D2511:32a-14: gtan tshigs gang gi phyir zhe na /
T02D2511:32a-15: thams cad la rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2511:32a-16: mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa'i rnam par
T02D2511:32a-17: rtog pa med pa nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba'i
T02D2511:32a-18: don to // yang na de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
T02D2511:32a-20: padma dang las kyi rigs rnams la rdo rje dang
T02D2511:32a-21: don dang chos dang thams cad kyi sgras bshad la
T02D2511:32a-22: / de rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid de /
T02D2511:32a-23: de nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa yin la /
T02D2511:32a-24: byang chub chen po yang de nyid yin zhes snga ma bzhin du thams cad brjod par bya'o //
T02D2511:32a-25: ye shes kyi khu tshur yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2511:32a-26: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya bcings pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2511:32a-27: don gyi gnas 'di nyid ces bya ba ni /
T02D2511:32a-28: rdo rje mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang
T02D2511:32a-29: chub pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshig bzhi
T02D2511:32a-30: po'i don slar yang rgya cher ston cing yang rnam
T02D2511:32a-31: grangs gzhan gyis 'chad par mdzad pa'o//
T02D2511:32a-32: 'dzum pa zhes bya ba ni cung zad bzhad pa ste /
T02D2511:32a-33: de dang bcas pas 'di gsungs so zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02D2511:32a-34: chos thams cad ni tshig bzhir gsungs pa'o //
T02D2511:32a-35: de rnams kyis mnyam pa nyid ni chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid de /
T02D2511:32a-36: de la dmigs pa'i nges pa'i tshul gyis thugs ni
T02D2511:32a-37: snying ste de ston par byed pa'i yi ge la
T02D2511:32a-38: yang nye bar gdags pas snying po zhes bya ste
T02D2511:32a-39: / de gsungs pa ni bka' stsal pa'o //
T02D2511:32a-40: bzhad pa chen pos bzhad cing zhes bya ba ni
T02D2511:32a-41: de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul ba'i sems can gyi khams
T02D2511:32a-42: rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i cha lugs kyis sangs
T02D2511:32b-0: rgyas kyi byang @32b chub thob par mthong ba dang
T02D2511:32b-1: / dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba skyes nas bzhad pa chen pos bzhad pa mdzad do //
T02D2511:32b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa yang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de /
T02D2511:32b-3: de nyid ni rdo rje yin la /
T02D2511:32b-5: de byin gyis rlob pa ni bstan par byas pa
T02D2511:32b-6: de la dmigs pa'i sems rtse gcig pa gang gis
T02D2511:32b-7: khyad par du byas pa gang yin pa de la
T02D2511:32b-8: ni ming 'di nyid ces bya ste /
T02D2511:32b-9: ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs nas dkyil
T02D2511:32b-10: 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so zhes bya bar sbyar
T02D2511:32b-11: ro // ming 'di skad ces bya zhe na /
T02D2511:32b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2511:32b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na
T02D2511:32b-14: nyid ni rdo rje'i mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs
T02D2511:32b-15: par byang chub pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can
T02D2511:32b-16: no // de nyid ni rdo rje ste /
T02D2511:32b-17: de ston par byed pa nyid kyis na ming de
T02D2511:32b-18: nyid ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po gang yin
T02D2511:32b-19: pa 'di gsungs so zhes bya ba ni bka' stsal
T02D2511:32b-20: pa'o // dkyil 'khor ni sngar bshad pa nyid de thams cad du sgo ni brgyad char bya'o //
T02D2511:32b-21: 'dir sgrub pa thams cad ni yi ge a'a nyid kyis bya'o //
T02D2511:32b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2511:32b-23: la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i
T02D2511:32b-24: phyag rgya bcing ba las byung ba'i dang po'i rdo
T02D2511:32b-26: badzra badzra aa zhes zlos shing cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug par bya'o //
T02D2511:32b-27: rnam par mi rtog sbyor ba yi //
T02D2511:32b-28: zhes bya ba ni chos bdag med pa bsgoms pas so //
T02D2511:32b-29: slob ma rnams la sbyin zhes bya ba ni 'byor
T02D2511:32b-30: pa ci yod pas kha zas sbyin no zhes bya
T02D2511:32b-31: ba'i don to // mtshan ma bzhi zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dang rin po che dang /
T02D2511:32b-33: sna tshogs rdo rje skal pa ji lta ba bzhin
T02D2511:32b-34: du me tog gang la babs pa de la mtshan
T02D2511:32b-36: dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa tsam nyid kyis las rnams
T02D2511:32b-37: 'grub par 'gyur zhes bya ba 'di ni ye shes
T02D2511:32b-38: babs par gyur pa rnams kyi yin par thams cad
T02D2511:32b-39: blta bar bya'o // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D2511:32b-40: kyi bde ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs
T02D2511:32b-41: pa bsgoms pa'i bde ba ste /
T02D2511:32b-42: des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad tshim par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2511:33a-1: la sogs pa babs pas so //
T02D2511:33a-2: bdag phul ba ni phyag bzhi'i sbyor bas so //
T02D2511:33a-3: me tog la sogs pa la bzlas pa ni rdo rje sbrang rtsi dang /
T02D2511:33a-6: rdo rje dgun rnams kyi sngags brjod pa ste /
T02D2511:33a-8: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun ni //
T02D2511:33a-9: dam tshig chen po gsum 'di yin //
T02D2511:33a-11: de lta bus dkon mchog gsum mchod par bya'o //
T02D2511:33a-12: thams cad la byams pa'i bzlas pa ni phyogs bcu'i
T02D2511:33a-13: sems can gyi khams thams cad la byams pas khyab
T02D2511:33a-14: par spro ste bzlas pa ni byams pa'i bzlas pa'o
T02D2511:33a-15: // sa gnon gyi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2511:33a-16: stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la lhag par
T02D2511:33a-17: mos par byas pa'i bzlas pa ni brtan zhing nges
T02D2511:33a-18: pa'i bzlas pa'o // nam mkha'i snying po'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas te /
T02D2511:33a-19: rdo rje rin chen gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2511:33a-20: rgyan thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yang dag par mchod la /
T02D2511:33a-21: bdag nyid kyis rang nyid la rnam pa thams cad bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2511:33a-22: lag pa g-yon pas padma bzung la /
T02D2511:33a-23: rang gi snying gar bzhag ste /
T02D2511:33a-24: lag pa g-yas pas dbye bar bya ba 'di ni rdo rje padma la lta ba'o //
T02D2511:33a-25: 'phags pa rdo rje nyid ni rdo rje las kyi mchog go //
T02D2511:33a-26: ye shes kyi khu tshur ni byang chub kyi mchog go //
T02D2511:33a-27: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'grel pa'o //
T02D2511:33a-28: da ni khro bas khro ba spang bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2511:33a-29: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor ston par bzhed pa /
T02D2511:33a-30: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2511:33a-31: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2511:33a-32: ma rungs pa yang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas ma rungs pa thams cad de /
T02D2511:33a-33: lha chen po la sogs pa'o //
T02D2511:33a-34: ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul bar mdzad pas na
T02D2511:33a-35: ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul ba ste 'dul bar
T02D2511:33a-36: mdzad cing des khro ba spong bar mdzad pas 'dul
T02D2511:33a-37: ba'o // de ni rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi gzugs can gyi de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa'o //
T02D2511:33a-38: yang zhes bya ba ni slar yang zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2511:33a-39: chos kyang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas chos thams cad de /
T02D2511:33a-41: de rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid ni de bzhin nyid do //
T02D2511:33a-42: des rnam par rgyal ba ni mnyam pa nyid bsgoms pas /
T02D2511:33b-0: zhe sdang la sogs @33b pa nges par bstsal ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2511:33b-1: rnam par rgyal ba de'i bsdu ba shes rab kyi
T02D2511:33b-2: pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa gang gis mngon
T02D2511:33b-3: sum du byed par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de
T02D2511:33b-4: la ming 'di nyid ces bya ste /
T02D2511:33b-5: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa de gsungs pa'o //
T02D2511:33b-6: 'dod chags kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2511:33b-7: de la 'dod chags ni kun du zhen pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
T02D2511:33b-8: de'i spros pa ni kha dog dang dbyibs dang reg
T02D2511:33b-9: pa dang nye bar spyod pa'i mtshan nyid can no
T02D2511:33b-10: // spros pa yod pa ma yin pas na spros pa med pa ste /
T02D2511:33b-11: 'dod chags kyi spros pa rnams mnyam pa nyid du
T02D2511:33b-12: bsgoms pas 'dod chags nye bar mi dmigs so zhes
T02D2511:33b-14: 'dod chags kyi spros pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid
T02D2511:33b-15: ni 'dod chags kyi spros pa med pa nyid do
T02D2511:33b-16: // des zhe sdang spros pa med pa nyid do //
T02D2511:33b-17: de yang zhe sdang ni sems can la gnod par bya bar 'dod pa ste /
T02D2511:33b-18: de'i spros pa ni mnar sems ring po dgu dang /
T02D2511:33b-19: bcu po gnas ma yin pa la khro ba'o //
T02D2511:33b-20: spros pa yod pa ma yin pas na spros pa med pa ste /
T02D2511:33b-21: mnar sems can gyi dngos po dmigs su med pa'o //
T02D2511:33b-23: gang la rjes su chags pa med pa de la khong khro bar 'gyur te /
T02D2511:33b-24: rjes su chags pa'i dngos po dmigs su med pas
T02D2511:33b-25: khong khro ba 'di'i dngos po yang nye bar dmigs
T02D2511:33b-27: de bas na 'dod chags kyi spros pa med pa
T02D2511:33b-28: nyid kyi zhe sdang gi spros pa med pa nyid
T02D2511:33b-29: du 'gyur ro // zhe sdang gi dngos po nye
T02D2511:33b-30: bar mi dmigs pas gti mug gi dngos po dmigs
T02D2511:33b-32: de bas na gti mug gi spros pa med pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
T02D2511:33b-33: de yang gti mug ni ma rig pa ste de'i
T02D2511:33b-34: spros pa ni dbang phyug rgyur 'dod pa la sogs
T02D2511:33b-36: gti mug gi dngos po dmigs su med pas kyang chos thams cad dmigs su med pa yin te /
T02D2511:33b-37: de bas na gti mug gi spros pa dmigs su
T02D2511:33b-38: med pa nyid kyis chos thams cad spros pa med
T02D2511:33b-40: chos thams cad ni khams gsum na spyod pa'i sems sam sems las byung ba rnams sam /
T02D2511:33b-41: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /
T02D2511:33b-42: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sogs pa'o //
T02D2511:34a-0: de rnams kyi spros pa ni dbye bar yongs @34a * //
T02D2511:34a-2: 'dod pa'i khams na spyod pa la sogs pa'i tshul
T02D2511:34a-3: gyis chos thams cad la ma spros pas na spros
T02D2511:34a-6: chos thams cad dmigs su med pas kyang shes rab
T02D2511:34a-7: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spros pa med pa
T02D2511:34a-8: nyid du rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ste ;
T02D2511:34a-9: gang chos thams cad dmigs su med pa de nyid
T02D2511:34a-10: ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin
T02D2511:34a-11: na zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2511:34a-12: de nyid kyis na 'di ni chos thams cad kyi
T02D2511:34a-13: mnyam pa nyid kyis rnam par rgyal ba bsdu ba
T02D2511:34a-14: zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T02D2511:34a-16: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje'i
T02D2511:34a-17: phyag rgya ni rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya'o
T02D2511:34a-18: // padma'i gdong khro gnyer dang bcas pa la sogs

T02D2511:43b-10: bya ba ni smon pa byang chub kyi sems so
T02D2511:43b-11: // gnyis pa sems bsgom pa'i mtshan nyid can ni 'jug pa byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D2511:43b-12: gsum pa ni byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid kyi sems ni byang chub sems so //
T02D2511:43b-13: de ltar na gsum po 'di dag bskyed pa ni byang chub tu sems bskyed pas te /

T02D2511:43b-17: byang chub tu sems bskyed pas ni nges pa kho

T02D2511:43b-32: mchod pa thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas pa de'i

T02D2511:43b-34: 'khor ro // de la dmigs shing ming de skad

T02D2511:44a-10: rang gi thugs kar bstod pa'i tshul gyis sna tshogs
T02D2511:44a-12: sku dang yan lag zla ba'i mdog la sogs pa'i
T02D2511:44a-13: kha dog lnga pa'i mdog can zhes bya ba la

T02D2511:44a-23: de rnams las gang zhig gzhag ce na /
T02D2511:44a-24: phyag na rdo rje dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa brgyad po gsungs so //
T02D2511:44a-25: phyag na ci zhig bsnams she na /

T02D2511:44a-28: pa'i tshul gyis zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T02D2511:44a-29: de la byang chub kyi sems phyag na bsnams pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
T02D2511:44a-30: phyag na rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsnams zhes bya ba'i don to ;
T02D2511:44a-31: / phyag na ting nge 'dzin ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ste /

T02D2511:44a-34: rdo rje rin chen bsnams zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2511:44a-35: rdo rje khu tshur ni phyag gi phyag rgyas yongs su 'dzin pa ste /

T02D2511:44a-37: 'phags pa 'jam dpal ni phyag na stong pa nyid smra ba ste /
T02D2511:44a-38: phyag na ral gri bsnams zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2511:44a-39: sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor

T02D2511:44b-8: rdo rje thams cad bcings la zhes bya ba la /

T02D2511:44b-10: rdo rje bsnams pa las byung ba'i rdo rje rin

T02D2511:44b-26: rdo rje sbrang rtsi la sogs pa'i phyag rgyas ni me tog dor ba la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D2511:44b-27: nam mkha' mdzod kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'grel pa'o /
T02D2511:44b-29: // / bsrung ba yongs su bskyangs pas gsang sngags yongs

T02D2511:45a-31: khro bo'i gzi brjod 'di ci zhig yin zhe na /
T02D2511:45a-32: sems can thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /

T02D2511:46a-29: thams cad las zhes bya ba la thams cad kyang

T02D2511:46a-32: dang sangs rgyas la mchod pa'i las kyi rigs so
